212.author: jubei747
212.review: I've been using iOS products since the first gen iPhone but have stuck to using Windows PCs until now. Big mistake! I have been amazed at how seamlessly everything syncs between my iPhone and Mac and I love the handoff feature. The display on this model is great and I've been very impressed at how fast it runs. Very satisfied so far.
212.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

213.author: Mcollier
213.review: My son needed this laptop for college and I have talked to him since he went off to college and he says the MacBook Pro is working out great for him. Since its an Apple product, he can get him homework completed and turned in to the professor's. He is very pleased with the product so far. It was a little expensive, but that's with any Apple product.
213.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

214.author: slimt
214.review: Have always used windows based computer and was reluctant to try the Mac but many friends seem to love theirs and I have to say after a little adjustment it is very easy to use, system loads quickly and really enjoy many features about the Mac over the windows based computer. The newer Mac requires a dongle (which is an extra expense but the only way to use a USB or any ports)- but that's how Apple rolls right?.
214.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

215.author: Roxxeee
215.review: I purchased it because I bought an HP about a year and a half ago but it was no longer meeting my needs as a full time student and I would use for work purposes because I work from home and it was no longer keeping up with my daily usage. I’m a really happy with my purchase so far and my only complaint is that accessories are really pricey and always seem to be sold out everywhere I go.
215.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

216.author: Aldo
216.review: I fully recommend the basic MacBook Pro model, specifically over the Air. If you have the money I'd even purchase the i7 Core as well. However, this will REALLY only benefit you if you are doing serious projects (video editing, etc.). In lieu of purchasing this machine at Apple, Best Buy treated me fair and my customer service associate helped me calculate monthly payments prior to financing the product. You'll love it.
216.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

217.author: MiraRose
217.review: So far so good. This product has been amazing so far. I have always been a PC user and decided to switch to Mac after all of my Pcs breaking down on me. This product is quick, I have had zero pop ups, and the staff at Best buy was very informative. The only reason it is a 4 is because the price is pretty high and I had to purchase the low memory model because the one with more memory cost extra. Overall a great product.
217.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

218.author: Cjohn
218.review: I use this computer mainly for video editing on FCPX. It has handled 4K video projects with ease. I was unsure of the usefulness of a touch bar, but I am pleasantly surprised. Overtime in various programs I find myself looking to the touch bar for useful shortcuts and about 70% of the time the shortcut is there. Overall, great buy considering the $300 off sale price.
218.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

219.author: SpEdWildcat2013
219.review: I knew that I wanted to get a Mac and used to have a MacBook Pro so I automatically knew I wanted another one. I love this new one! The only thing I'm not too happy with is only having 2 ports, especially when I need to charge my computer because then I only have 1. It's super fast, the picture quality is outstanding and it's as easy to use as my other one. I would highly recommend this computer to anyone looking for a new one!
219.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

220.author: Weathergirl427
220.review_title: Great Laptop for School and Work
220.review: This laptop is amazing. The screen display is great. It charges fully in about an hour and the battery lasts forever. I’m in school and use it for papers and homework. I needed a Mac to run some software for my degree program and it works well for that. I wouldn’t recommend for light surfing on the web because you can find something just as nice for cheaper, but for heavier work loads this product is great.
220.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

221.author: Nati
221.review: It definitely exceeded my expectations, my first Apple laptop was a necessary purchase due to school. I love how fast it is and how I can download apps like on my phone.An additional feature I enjoy on my mac is that I can pair it to my tv and stream movies from my mac without additional devices. It is very light weight and slim, a plus when your on the go or on mass transit. College discount was great too.
221.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

222.author: amlm
222.review: I know it is a big purchase, but I could not imagine having any other computer. I don't know how I have gone so long without a Macbook. I never thought I'd be the one to say it. I did extensive researching on laptops before purchasing, and this just seemed to make the most sense. I have had it for a couple of months now and am still learning new features all the time, but I could not be happier with my purchase.
222.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

223.author: BigKahuna
223.review: Apple is making you buy a multi-port attachment if you want to connect to peripherals. The Apple logo on top of cover does not light up when on. The screen does not rotate 360 degrees nor does it have a touchscreen like others. Apple keeps raising their prices and giving you less. Competitors like Dell have caught up to Apple with lower prices. This is a good little laptop but you can buy a comparable one for less money.
223.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

224.author: Jimmy
224.review: I have had the same Apple desktop computer for over 5 years and have never had any issues with it. When my daughter was preparing to enter high school, I did my research about the Apple laptops. This one I bought her was perfect for her to do research, multimedia, and work online for some of her classes on the learning management system. I am completely happy with my purchase and will never go back to a Microsoft OS.
224.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

225.author: Campos
225.review_title: Great power and lighter design than the old pros
225.review: I use this computer mostly for work, app desig, Skype calls, financial trading, Microsoft office, beginners photoshop and it has been working great. Two things I don’t like are the keyboard it’s a bit noise and it gets kind of hot when charging. I used to have an air and I didn’t had that problem. It only has 2 usb-c so you have to buy adapters if you want to connect anything that is mostly use.
225.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

226.author: Gambit
226.review: I really like apple products for its look and easy to use. I use to only go PC because of excel and word but with this I can access all microsoft software. Although some keys you need to learn but it is still easy. I can't go back to PC. Apple is so much quicker. I love the color when you watch movies as well.
226.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

227.author: bban5566
227.review: I purchased this new MacBook to replace my mid-2012 laptop that I had lots of issues. The mid-2017 model was definitely an improvement. My only complaint is that like my old MacBook, it will get kind of hot after using it for a while or running big programs. Obviously, that's pretty typical, but the cooling fan is annoyingly loud.
227.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

228.author: Mommy03
228.review:
I got the cool grey 13 inch Mac Pro and am in love with every detail. the first one I initially got a line appeared out of no where. it wasn't ink nor a scratch so I took it to Best Buy and they were able to give me another one immediately. 
although I've never owned a Mac Pro and it was a little difficult for me to use at the beginning but I've now got the Hang of it and it is amazing.
228.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

229.author: YourAverageJoe
229.review_title: A quality employee with a quality product
229.review: I wanted to get a MacBook to further progress my love for music creation and the customer support couldn't have been better. An employee having knowledge of not only music creation but just the multiple creative uses of such a device on a large scale from podcasts to film creation. And at the end of it, I got me a 13" MacBook Pro; a device that performs beautifully. A purchase & visiting experience I'll truly remember.
229.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

230.author: Anne
230.review: I enjoy using my laptop. I find this laptop very handy and it has a clear picture. I don't mind the clicking of the keyboard that is a minor issue when you are using it, What could be improved is the charging facility on the side of the computer you cannot charge your IPhone from the side of this computer which is inconvenient.
230.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

231.author: Sben147
231.review: This computer was purchased for a student working in the Film Production program at school. It has worked flawlessly and effortlessly through the program. This has been one of the best purchases for the student in the program to excel at what he loves. Very pleased with the performance of the computer.
231.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

232.author: Maegz
232.review_title: Great laptop, purchased for software engineer
232.review: I purchased this MacBook Pro for my boyfriend who is studying software engineering. It works very well and we haven't had any issues thus far. I own the more powerful version plus the Touch Bar. They are light, sleek, and easy to use. Some people don't like the new keyboard, but I haven't found it to be bothersome (we type for hours at a time). Sometimes the machines do run hot, but otherwise no issue.
232.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

233.author: Mime
233.review_title: I am still trying to adjust to Apple.
233.review:
I have always been a Windows user and I am still transitioning to Apple.
I have an Apple 7 phone, IPad and Apple TV and I thought it would be more convenient to have an Apple computer. I only have it for two months and, at this point, I still favor Windows 10. I am probably too set in my ways so t I will continue to use the MacBook Pro and hope my learning experience will change my opinion.
233.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

234.author: Gaby
234.review: Bought this for my son's 1st year of college. Computer was working great and out of nowhere started glitching. Sometimes its the right side that glitches, sometimes it the bottom. He is in college and needs his computer to be told it will take weeks before they can get it right again is not something I cared to hear. Especially when it is clearly a defect.
234.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

235.author: Heather37
235.review: It’s a great computer my only complaint is how fragile and thin the new Retina display is because I got a mysterious crack at the very bottom of my screen and there is now I blackmline going down my screen I’ve only had this computer for two months but Apple won’t cover it under warranty because it’s external I really have no clue how the crack got there and it’s barely visible
235.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

236.author: Issarod12
236.review: I loved this Mac but was not compatible with a program required for school. Sadly I had to return it. I am not looking for something similar in weight and how fast it. If apple made it a little more compatible I would have kept it and gave it 5 stars. For the price, I should not have compatibility issues. I have an Apple Watch and phone but their laptop is a whole other issues.
236.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

237.author: Bret
237.review: As an iPhone user, it was a no-brainer to pick the MacBook because of how well they pair together. I love my Mac. It is lightweight, has a beautiful screen and portable. The only problem is the ports, I bought a $20 dongle to get a USB adapter. I have had no problems with it slowing down at all and the battery life is pretty good. I would highly recommend this for a college student.
237.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

238.author: scubasteve
238.review_title: it doesn't get better than Apple Mac
238.review: I was replacing a Mac that took on wine damage :o(.I am. not a computer wiz. It is loaded with everything I need. I would highly recommend it to my friends and family. The salesperson for my purchase was outstanding. he was professional, knowledgeable, evaluated my needs and helped me make a smart decision!
238.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

239.author: jp1992
239.review: I decided to buy this laptop cause I was starting school. So far this is one of the best laptops that I have owned. taking notes in class on it is amazing. its pretty fast and really quiet. the screen is amazing. I have heard people complain about the speakers in it but I think they sound great I watch movies on it all the time and somehow they figured out how to get realistic surround sound into this thing.
239.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

240.author: SkylerNorrod
240.review: I was very hesitant on which MacBook I should buy, the pro or the air. For me, it came down to a $100 difference, so I decided to go with the pro, and I can say I am highly impressed! This is an amazing laptop and it does exactly everything I want it to and more! I would definitely recommend this to anyone who is thinking about it! I was hesitant on the keyboard at first, but I have grown to love it!
240.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

241.author: sack
241.review: Having never used a Mac, I have found that my notebook has been easy to adjust to, even though I am still in the learning phase, It looks like it will be smooth sailing. I like the fact that I was able to purchase a Bluetooth mouse and it synced to my notebook. I never have been fond of the built in mouse pad and this was an easy fix for me.
241.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

242.author: VuNguyen
242.review: This is my 4th MacBook Pro so I knew pretty much what to expect. Seamless experience if you’re in the Apple ecosystem. Works great with my AirPods and Apple TV. I was fortunate enough to snag this one a sale and paid about $300 less than what apple is charging for the same laptop! I use it mainly for photoshop/Lightroom editing as well as some work stuff. Hasn’t let me down yet.
242.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

243.author: jprakes
243.review_title: Bought as a gift, my wife loves it.
243.review: My wife's previous Macbook Pro was reaching the end of it's life so I bought this one as a replacement. Very nice design, and is very quick and smooth. I like the USB-C ports, like our Pixel phones, we are trying to future proof any new devices that we are purchasing. The display looks very good, not one of the greatest displays, but a very very good display none the less. My wife loves it.
243.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

244.author: Phil
244.review: I thought I had spilled water inside my back pack because it smelled like mold. I swapped the bag and threw the smelly one in the wash. The new backpack also started smelling like mold and so I sniffed everything and determined the white power cord smells! Terrible. Actually gives me a headache. I’ve left it out and am hoping with time the smell goes away.
244.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

245.author: stbeson
245.review: I love this laptop, from the crisp Retina display to the 7th Generation core I5 processor. This being my first Macintosh computer, I found everything beautiful compared to the average windows 10. Other than the lack of USB ports, nothing could be improved on this notebook computer.
245.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

246.author: Emduc
246.review: My daughter needed a new computer for school and wanted a Macbook. When we walked into BestBuy, the salesman in the Apple section was very helpful. He explained the difference between the Pro and the Air. He helped us find the accessories needed. I personally have a Macbook Pro that I have been using for 7 years now, exceptional computer and long life span.
246.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

247.author: LoyalBestBuyCustomer
247.review_title: Great laptop for a new college student
247.review: I bought this laptop for my daughter who will be starting her freshman year at college this Aug. Best Buy offered this laptop at a price lower than anywhere else (including at the college she will be attending with her student discount). Also, the sales associate at the Best Buy store where I bought it was very helpful. Overall great experience.
247.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

248.author: Rees
248.review: I bought it for the best possible price. I wasn't shopping for it at all, but accidentally went through Apple section and for that price I thought this could be a valuable purchase and I was right. This little guy can do everything that iMac can do but on a go, of course a bit slower, but it does all I need to and on the go :)
248.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

249.author: Caseman10001
249.review: Aside from the price the computer is fantastic im used to apple products so navigating through it and serup was a breeze. If only they weremt so pricey. Yoi can find a non apple laptop or pc that ia comparable in apeed and graphics and other hardware for less cost but if you know and love apple like i do then you stick to what you know.
249.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

250.author: AthleticAttorney
250.review_title: Great laptop!! Still needs to get to 2017
250.review: I still don't like the fact my 2011 Sony Vaio was i7 and in 2017 the basic premium macbook pro is an i5. Still no 360 tablet feature which would also be cool. My computing requirements are minimal so it functions alright. Still exploring but no issues so far and hopefully it won't conk out like the HP Spectre motherboard that went haywire in less than 2 years and $1000 down the drain!
250.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

251.author: ODIDY
251.review_title: Love my Macbook...Hate my USB C
251.review: I love Apple & everything they do. My MacBook Pro is no different. I am so heavily invested into the eco system of iOS & Mac OS that I will be shocked if I ever walk away from them. That being said, it's going to take sometime getting use to USB-C. Buying additional attachments just to use my industry standard devices or to just charge my iPhone seems/feels like a money grab. #sigh.
251.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

252.author: KateSpadeLover
252.review: This MacBook is AMAZING!!! My daughter is able to pretty much do EVERYTHING & more with this laptop! With high-school your always gonna have essays & papers to write so this made things a lot easier when it came to doing all that. We also got a great deal from Best Buy when we purchased it so that was a bonus as well!!!
252.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

253.author: donuts12
253.review_title: What I expected from a Mac
253.review:
This is my second MacBook Pro. My first 15" went 6 years with daily use. Apple MacBook Pro display is beautiful high definition and my 2017 13" is even a higher definition than my 2011 model. 
Never worry about a virus and my 2017 model has almost a 10 hour battery charge. Big improvement.
253.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

254.author: bwman
254.review_title: Best choice for a starter of Apple laptop
254.review: Have been using this MacBook Pro 13'', the fist ever Apple laptop for me, for about a month. Must say it is a well balanced piece -- light weight, right sized display, very fast charging speed. Usually it consumes only 50-60% of the battery for a continuous usage of 8 hours in a clinical work setting, and takes about 1.5 hour to recharge to 100%.
254.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

255.author: Steeler
255.review_title: You get the Quality you pay for with this MacBook
255.review: It's true you get what you pay for but with this MacBook you get a lot of quality for the dollar. I replaced a 15 inch with this 13 inch and I was afraid I would regret the smaller screen but I am very satisfied I went ahead with it. It is actually quite adequate and probably Apple's best bang for the buck.
255.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

256.author: Rodgreen
256.review: This is the most amazing computer I have ever owned. I upgraded from the MacBook to this MacBook Pro and the speeds are amazing. Much slimmer and easy to carry in my backpack. Startup speed is the fastest I’ve ever seen and the Retina display is amazing. If you are a Mac user and don’t care about the Gucci slide bar on the next step up computer then this is the machine for you.
256.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

257.author: KC13
257.review: after an update to my 2011 MacBook Pro left it not working quite right, I decided it was time for an upgrade. I was amazed by how much smaller and lighter it is than my 2011 MBP. It was outof the box, updated, and connected in under 30 minutes, and the majority of that was the initial update. Very happy with the purchase and I’m glad I decided to stick with The macbook
257.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

258.author: egreen25
258.review: Finally Switched from Windows to Apple. Very happy w/choice. It integrates with all of my other Apple products. There is a learning curve, but I am slowly but surely getting used to the variances. I spent a little more in this computer than I normally would have in the past, but I think it is going to be well worth it in the long run.9
258.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

259.author: CutThroat
259.review: Apple fan boy I guess. The screen clarity is great, battery life is good. I don't watch movies or anything on my MacBook so I haven't really drained the battery. I do run my iPad as a second monitor and that does seem to drain the battery a bit fast. I do listen to music when working and the sound is a great improvement from previous MacBook pros. One of the biggest plus' is how thin and light it is.
259.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

260.author: Divesh
260.review: Sometimes you have lot of expectation and when you actually see it may not live unto that. The same was the case here. I thought MacBook Pro would be out of the world. Definitly some of the things are absolutely fantastic like boot time, shut down, appearance, responsiveness. But there are some cons as well like keypad make lot of noise while typing,touchpad is not very responsive.
260.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

261.author: Tripp
261.review: I absolutely love my new MacBook Pro! The reason is, It works & It just looks incredible. The Pro already has the necessary programs and operates so smoothly. It has 2-USB C ports and 1-headphone jack, which really hasn't bothered me. I have an iPhone 7 Plus and the integration between the two is absolutely outstanding. Do yourself a favor and go for a Mac. You won't regret buying this product.
261.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

262.author: Justin
262.review:
While the lack of repairability of this product basically forces you to purchase apple care, I can still safely recommend that if you are to buy a laptop, make it a Macbook Pro (any... Just make sure it fits your needs), or a Microsoft Surface Book. (I own both.)

Just make sure you grab the HyperDrive USB-C hub for this. The 7 port one preferably for around $99.
262.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

263.author: GradStudent18
263.review: I love my new MacBook Pro! I was originally going to purchase the MacBook Air since it was cheaper, but the extra amount spent was worth it! The screen quality is amazing, and the speed is super fast, which are both great qualities for a laptop that will be used in grad school for everyday note-taking. I don't have any complaints!
263.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

264.author: CC24
264.review: This is my first MacBook ever and I'm in love. I'm never getting another HP, Dell or Acer Laptop again. I bought this laptop last year as a Christmas present for myself and it's perfect for my uses. Typing is super easy and the weight is perfect enough for me to carry in my handbag to and from work or school. It runs smoothly, so far no issues.
264.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

265.author: kdm23
265.review: This computer works well for someone familiar with apple products. It allows text messaging and FaceTiming, which is great for a college student. The camera seemed "fuzzy" the first few times it was used, but has since become clearer. It is extremely lightweight and portable. It is expensive, but we made the decision to purchase this computer for its longevity and minimal susceptibility to viruses.
265.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

266.author: dino
266.review: This is one of the best laptops I've had, I am actually using it to make this review. The keyboard is really tactile and satisfying. I don't know why some people hate this keyboard. And the trackpad may seem big at first, but it has great palm rejection for my big hands. The trackpad is also probably the best in the market right now too.
266.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

267.author: Muadib395
267.review: While I normally get a pc as I need extra horsepower, One of my kids needed a MacBook for school. This laptop, while expensive for what it is, does a very good job. Its light and powerful enough for what is needed. Good battery life, and while the screen is not as large as I would like, its a good balance for this laptop.
267.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

268.author: bigpayne11
268.review_title: Excellent computer for an excellent price
268.review: Best Buy was a better price on this specific computer than both Beach Camera and Microcenter. I am buying an Apple computer again because they always work and work well for years. I love the display and the keyboard quality. I just wish Apple would include a display adapter (for connecting USB items and multiple displays) considering the price of this computer.
268.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

269.author: Kylep182
269.review: The new MacBook Pro is really thin and light which is a must for me in purchasing a laptop. It has two USB-C ports and you immediately need an adapter for your devices. I wish it came with at least two more ports and maybe for the price Apple could have thrown in the adapter. The display and colors are absolutely gorgeous. In terms of battery life, I find the 10-hour claim to be almost true.
269.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

270.author: Dusty
270.review: My previous MacBook Pro was 10 years old and starting to have issues so it was time to trade up. Although this one is 2" smaller it's a great little MAC that's super fast with excellent resolution. I love that it's so lightweight and slim. I use it mostly for editing pictures with Ligthroom and Photoshop. I'd never own anything other than a MAC :)
270.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

271.author: ThatGuy
271.review: Typing on this computer is absolutely terrible! Returned after a few weeks of use because of the keyboard. Yes the laptop is thin but they sacrificed a good typing experience to make it happen. The lack of ports is bad too. You would have to spend hundreds extra in dongles to get the functionality of a similar priced laptop from a different brand.
271.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

272.author: Eraerid
272.review: The screen and the keyboard are my favorite features with this Macbook model. The large trackpad does not bother me, and the speed is great. I am also glad that this Macbook has two fans compared to the Macbook air that I previously had. I wish this model has at least two more USB C ports with an added USB 3.0 port. I do not mind the dongle life, but not when they are $50 plus.
272.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

273.author: NewMacUser
273.review: I was advised that I'd be able to use the lower storage option because of my use of cloud services. This hasn't worked out as I had hoped and as explained to me by the Best Buy assistant. I'm a bit miffed about it but will have to change a few things as a workaround. Otherwise, the machine is slick and fits my requirements.
273.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

274.author: Wireless
274.review: Had a Windows laptop ever since college, so this is my first Apple laptop. Already familiar with the OS, so it's not a challenge for me. Lighter than my previous Surface Book, which I replaced because I had no use for the touch screen anymore. I have Apple everything else, so integration was a breeze.
274.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

275.author: Tina
275.review: I really like the size of this Macbook. I needed something lighter, but didn't want to sacrifice the capabilities of a laptop, and after researching my choices I ended up buying this model. If you don't want the "latest" tech piece, I would really suggest buying this macbook.
275.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

276.author: mc32vol
276.review: I really can’t say enough about this machine! I previously had a MacBook Pro from 2010 and this new machine is so improved! The battery life on this thing is amazing compared to the old one and the performance is outstanding. I’m really impressed. I thought I’d miss going from 15 inch to 13, but it’s really not so bad. I would totally buy this machine again if I had to!
276.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

277.author: PatS
277.review_title: Great, efficient product that is always reliable
277.review: Fantastic and reliable, Apple thinks of almost everything. Seamless intergration with my other products, sturdy and attractive case. I just took it out of the box and started using it. No need for 3 hours to update, add users and download antivirus (sorry Microsoft....). Was just ready to go. The addition of preloaded tutorials and real person tech support makes it a amazing purchase.
277.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

278.author: starlady123
278.review: I was going crazy with all of the continual updates from windows 10. even to the point where a unwanted update interfered with a internet order, and created a duplicate order. My Mac's Os is stable and reliable. This is the Best Buy that I have ever done. I have been using PC's since the mid 80"s. I must have bern asleep dealing with Microsoft for all those years.
278.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

279.author: Mustgt01
279.review_title: So much better then u think
279.review: Do not compare to the MacBook. This is leaps beyond. Even if u have owned a old MacBook Pro, this is so much smaller. It will feel and look like a smaller system in every way. I’m upgrading from two older pros. Phenomenal if u are a Mac user. And no, the keyboard is not a issue. Do not think twice, and yes, I wanted small, and am so much happier I went with the pro.
279.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

280.author: BLalla
280.review_title: Great Laptop Computer for all-day use
280.review: It's a Mac so it starts up very quickly and works every single time. The OS is rock-solid, and the hardware is impeccable. I use it for school and for my I.T. Cyber Security classes, where it easily out pastes my classmates Windows computers. While they are all fighting to find a seat near a power outlet, I don't even have to walk with my power cable for my 8 hour day.
280.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

281.author: cpadron1
281.review: I am coming from an apple MacBook Air, I decided to upgrade when my school required a computer with better performance. People often say how good the new MacBook Pro is, and I have to say it is amazing; the MacBook Pro has amazing performance and it is the best designed Mac that apple sells. The screen is amazing and I absolutely love the new keyboard and touch pad.
281.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

282.author: peck
282.review: I purchased this Mac for college. I thought it would be very difficult at first to adapt to a Mac after only using PCs, but so far it has been an easy transition and I really love my laptop. It's very lightweight, easy to transport, and has a great battery life. I love the keyboard, especially compared to PC, and the screen quality and other features have so far proven to be great.
282.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

283.author: Nolansc
283.review: Solid machine. It runs smoothly and haven't had much of a problem with anything, Only four stars due to the lack of good apps in the App store on mac's os. I figured at a netflix, hulu vudu etc apps. Nope. None. I can see the security reasons but sheez. At some point I use my macbook for play too. Four stars! I only wish I'd got more memory but I wasn't sure i'd like a mac this much.
283.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

284.author: SFClint
284.review: I love it. I have used a Mac mini and a MacbooPro at work, and decided to just go all apple. I have watched a few window to mac convert videos on youtube and it helps. When we got mac training at my job, it was very basic but they explained why it is a superior device. I believe them, it feels like a device I will carry with me and for the next decade....thats my goal.
284.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

285.author: maybaeparade
285.review: My 17 year old has been asking for a mac book for years. I finally bought her one. Best Buy had a great deal going on because of back to school. My daughter could not be happier. I also purchased the apple care. Apple products are awesome, but knowing I have this extra protection makes me happy.
285.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

286.author: schrodinger
286.review: It's what you expect. Premium body finish and screen. 128GB SSD not enough, OS lowers it to 80GB of usable space. Keyboard issues reported by other users have made me paranoid so I don't even want to press the keys too hard. I have an iPad Pro and it's a beauty, but will not buy MacBook Pro again, it just doesn't give me confidence.
286.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

287.author: Esp63
287.review:
What a great deal purchasing the MacBook Pro from Best Buy. This computer is easily as good as the touchbar version, but much more affordable. I love Apple computers, and the latest MacBook Pro is no exception. Great keyboard, outstanding speakers, and excellent design.
I highly recommend the latest release of the MacBook Pro.
287.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

288.author: CGonz
288.review: Had an older MacBook Pro, maybe 10 years old. Didn’t have much problems with it but after 10 yrs I decided to treat myself to a newer model, no regrets so far... Battery life is good and the processor is much faster along with the better screen. Using the FaceTime has been a Household Fav with the kids. Happy with this purchase
288.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

289.author: BigKahuna
289.review: Used to buy Dell and Asus, but made the jump to Apple because my family and I have iPhones which sync well together. Now we all have MacBooks. We love them compared to the others. I just don't like how slippery the metal body is. Apple should imbed grip lines when forming the body.
289.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

290.author: exceta
290.review: This macbook has served me very well. They last for many years and their processors are very advanced. Internet speed is so flawless and apple continues to impress for another year. Recommend getting this one with non-touch bar. Touch bar macbook is too expensive
290.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

291.author: Peytom
291.review: I bought this Macbook Pro to replace my Dell for school (I am a college student). I was a little nervous at first because I was so used to the windows operating system, but I quickly got used to this computer! It has so far had enough space to store all of my papers and homework, and I can organize everything easily in finder and onto desktop. No complaints what so ever!
291.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

292.author: Anthont
292.review_title: Three years marks a great difference
292.review: I upgraded from a 2015 Macbook Air and it has been the best decision I made. I thought I’d stick with the Air for much longer but I was blown away by the incredible performance, look and feel of this Pro. It plays stunning 4K footage and is complimented by amazing HDR audio. It is a bit in the pricey side but will last you a while which compensates the price tag.
292.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

293.author: videomike77
293.review: A very expensive item, but going to keep it! - I have always thought that these were overpriced as a PC guy I still use Windows and Linux but yes this is nice - is it worth it .. debatable, my daughter is a big Apple fan but she bought the one with the touch Pad .. not me that's a crazy price :-)
293.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

294.author: Momof5
294.review_title: Love the front speakers, battery not so great
294.review: My daughter used MACs for several years throughout MS & HS, so definitely wanted to have for college. Was excited with the improvements, but totally disappointed in the battery life of this model. Her HS computer would need to only be charged every other day (& it was used all day every school day). This one can't even get 5 hours before low battery.
294.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

295.author: Junebzy81
295.review_title: Apples always a great product but
295.review: But they’ve been getting too gready do they really need to have the thunderbolt drive extra it’s already one of the priceier laptops, also you might as well pay the extra to go pro, I feel like it seems just like to other models without it, if you’re spending 1700- might as well get all the bells and whistles for a few hundred more.
295.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

296.author: Jared
296.review: I had always been a PC guy, and refused to give in to the Apple conglomerate... but, man, do I love this thing. The speed, the slick design, the specific touches only available on a Mac, are second to none. I can only imagine how happy I'll be when we get ourselves the new iMac for Christmas.
296.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

297.author: bell
297.review: So, overall the computer does well, just as most MACs do. What I didn't realize, and this was my own mistake, is that it does not come with ports that I would need, like USB. It has the new USB-C, which is very new and I would need a converter to do anything. The nice feature is the bluetooth, so I can link devices up that way, but it does mean upgrading everything else I have.
297.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

298.author: Liam99
298.review: This is my second MacBook Pro. I use it for business. It has all the capabilities need for a business as well as school or for browsing the internet. The MacBook boots up lightening fast and has the quickest speeds when switching between open tabs. It has plenty of storage for pictures and documents. Overall I would recommend to anyone looking for a new Apple Computer.
298.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

299.author: Hornet4848
299.review: The best laptop out there! The quality and the user experience compared to a windows machine is night and day. The touch bar models are not worth the extra money, this is the perfect model for my every day computing needs. Overall I'm very satisfied with this purchase. I also saved $200 by price matching a competitors web site.
299.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

300.author: Sarah
300.review: After some time, I finally decided to make the switch to apple for laptops. And I definitely don't regret it! This is the perfect size, has really cool features and really make you feel like you're doing important things whenever you use it. I would recommend this to everybody and anybody!! You need this laptop!!
300.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

301.author: KyloRen
301.review_title: High quality laptop that does the job
301.review: For a college student, this is very easy to use and get used to, and does every job you'll need for college, if not most. From previous experiences with older Macbooks, they definitely last long (as long as you take good care of your device), but just wish they had included a USB port rather than making us buy a new one (like Apple usually does with everything they can.)
301.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

302.author: Freddo
302.review_title: MacBook Pro as good as ever
302.review: This computer replaced a 2011 MacBook Pro with a 15 inch screen. Transferred all my data over via Time Machine, which worked great. This will be my 4th MacBook Pro, and I don't think I'd ever have anything else.. Plenty of speed and memory on this machine, even as a semi-pro photographer. Super happy with my purchase and Best Buy terms of 18 months same as cash.
302.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

303.author: MusicMatt
303.review_title: MacBook Pro is great when on sale.
303.review:
As a recent switcher from PC's, it is hard to beat how well my MacBook Pro integrates with my phone and iPad. 

They may be initially more expensive, but the value is higher due to longer life span and stability over Windows computers.

I like Windows 10 and am adjusting to MacOS, but when these things are on sale, they are worth the purchase.
303.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

304.author: Jorge
304.review: Bought this Macbook Pro for work, I constantly need to upload and download videos. I also edit some videos and this laptop allows me to do it all effortlessly. It starts up very quickly and runs programs (multiple) well. The picture quality is excellent and sometimes I prefer to have leisure time on the laptop instead of my T.V ( which also looks stunning)
304.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

305.author: TomL
305.review:
Well for 10 years I have owned a lot of laptops (PC laptops) and none could offer the build quality this MacBook Pro has. 
Battery lasts long and it's pleasure to do your work there.
Initially, I thought 13 inches wouldn't be enough however resolution is set in the way (thanks to Retina display) that you can't imagine buying another laptop with bigger size.
305.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

306.author: Chubs
306.review: This computer is great. I am coming from a touch screen windows laptop. I was worried that I would miss the touch screen, but with the massive touch pad I do not. I am able to zoom which is something I do frequently. If you are on the fence, get off and go for it.
306.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

307.author: Grammie
307.review: I am very pleased with my purchase. Wasn't planning on a new computer, but no regrets. It is very sleek, fast, and user friendly. I love the sharp clear retina screen. I was very pleased had how efficiently my backup transferred all info from my old mac into my Mac Pro. Really like the enlarged pad size and the 13 inch size of the laptop is quite convenient to travel with
307.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

308.author: DECEMBERSEND
308.review:
This is our first Mac, I’ve always wanted one but never thought it was practical until now. Our current Windows Laptop over heats so quickly that you can’t get anything done, it’s always had a overheating problem.

The MacBook Pro doesn’t even get warm, it’s amazing. It’s truely a laptop.
308.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

309.author: Nelsonnh
309.review: This laptop is exceptionally fast and wonderful for both business and entertainment. The 128gb storage might seem a bit thin for some, but is you push a lot into the cloud like I do it is not an issue. The screen is wonderful to look at, with bright colors and a clarity that is hard to beat. Processing power is fast for all applications.
309.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

310.author: Morti
310.review: This most recent model of Macbook Pro (2017) comes in a slick design and offers great and fast performance. The Retina Display is amazing. The only caveat for the model I purchased is that it comes with only a 128 GB hard disk (you can get the bigger storage hard disk for a higher price though). I am happy with the purchase and would recommend it to others.
310.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

311.author: Remm
311.review: I love the sleek look of my laptop and I already have a few covers to switch it out, wether I’m in a math mood or biology mood. I’m am very happy with my purchase. However, I don’t quite agree with the featherlight. It’s heavier than my chrome book which I threw in a bag full of books. Now it just feel heavier. Concurrently, I have all the programs I need
311.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

312.author: JaMaris
312.review: I love this laptop. It’s lightweight. I can take it everywhere. Battery life has been good so far. No major issues. It sucks that it doesn’t have any ports like HDMI, SD, USB but the dongle I bought has been working just fine. I can edit pictures, everything is super fast and I like the connectivity between my iPhone and my Mac.
312.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

313.author: Nick
313.review: From the moment you take out of the box and power it up the MacBook Pro is magnificent. The looks alone speaks volumes to the quality. The overall performance that I have experienced is impressive, especially when going from a mid level windows laptop to this. The only complaint I have is the limited number of ports with just 2 usbc ports.
313.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

314.author: Psychdude
314.review: What can I say - It's a Mac. Setup was easy, I was able to sync with all my other apple devices, which creates a seamless environment to work. Very please with my sales rep at the Douglasville GA location - I won't use his name for privacy reasons, but the service was excellent.
314.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

315.author: BigDad
315.review: This was for my son who is a senior at CSUF. His old laptop was not working anymore and it was time. I did the research and the Mac Laptop was the right one at the right price. He says it is working great. The only sad note is that it does not include a combo drive like the old one, so we had to buy an external. Beside that it works just fine and he is enjoying it.
315.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

316.author: shiva9696
316.review: A macbook for beginners. Does everything an expensive macbook pro can and is a great alternative for people who want to purchase this over a Macbook Air. Offers great quality retina display, good speakers and good battery life. Extensions and hubs are very expensive to buy but that is unavoidable for all the new Macbooks now.
316.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

317.author: McKenzie
317.review: Love how this MacBook Pro looks and feels. Has a sleek design and construction. It's just the right size just to take anywhere with you just to do work and do binge watching. Also retina display is really amazing. It's like having a 4k tv squished into this tiny monster of a MacBook.
317.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

318.author: Thunder
318.review: Absolutely love this computer. Super fast. Easy access to applications. Convenient to use. However when purchasing this computer you will need to buy additional accessories for it. Apple made it so that there are no USB ports, therefore you have to buy a dongle or other accessories to fit your needs. Other than this minor flaw, this computer is great.
318.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

319.author: Cimm
319.review: My new Macbook is everything I need. I've become more efficient in my studies and day to day activities. Notes and reminders on my Mac have kept me organized especially through finals week and as I prepare to study abroad next semester. I needed a device I could trust to run fast and get things done - both Best Buy and Apple have not disappointed me.
319.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

320.author: Tsel
320.review: This was the ultimate Christmas gift for my 11 year old daughter. She couldn't wait to get it set up and once that was complete, she's not put it down since. Applications are nice, graphics are awesome, a win win for all. As always Apple products are a cut above the rest. This was an excellent purchase with an excellent price! Thank you Best Buy!!
320.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

321.author: msbarbosa85
321.review: my family and I just love all Apple products and I bought this laptop because I wanted to have something light and portable that can do everything I need to do for school. so far, I'm loving it and the new mac book pros are much lighter than they used to be a while back.
321.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

322.author: src123
322.review_title: Great all around laptop for students
322.review: This laptop is very efficient, and I've been able to run several applications with no trouble. I was worried about running some applications that would take a lot of power to run (like statistical software), but I've had no problems with it. Also, the battery life has been really great, haven't had any problems with running to charge my laptop yet.
322.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

323.author: WeMissRiptank
323.review_title: Macbook Pro from Knowledgable Local Apple experts
323.review: Team of best buy representatives and the Apple Rep/Manager are EXCEPTIONALLY awesome! My brothers and I have been shopping with this location for years and they remain one of the most elite that I have ever witnessed, even out of Dallas and Southlake Apple Retail Stores... Overall, Absolutely outstanding and thank you dudes! :)
323.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

324.author: Alan
324.review: I picked this up after using windows for quite sometime, I've used mac before and always liked it. I love the new space gray color and this keyboard, it's a love it or hate it..I love it. Its clicky, not alot of travel but I dont type a ton of documents in it anyways. Use it for editing photos and its great!
324.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

325.author: Joe1
325.review:
I have gone back and forth between Mac and windows for several years. I decided to give this laptop a try and so far I am happy with my decision. Since I was still pretty familiar with the Mac OS I have not had too many issues.

Happy with my purchase.
325.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

326.author: Vibrant
326.review: I love my MacBook. It is very fast & easy to work with. My daughter enjoys it immensely as well. She does all her college work on it. I do not think I will ever buy a different computer. I would definitely recommend purchasing one who is seeking to invest in a PC.
326.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

327.author: Meche
327.review: The past couple years I’ve gone through 2 laptops. Something tells me, after this Apple purchase, I’ll won’t be buying another one for quite some time. The speed on this processor is faster than any other laptop I’ve purchased. I knew little about Apples’s processing system and now I see the difference. Love my new Apple!
327.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

328.author: Curselets
328.review: I love how quickly everything is ready to go as soon as you open it up. So far, it’s handled multiple tabs and multiple programs and switching between them has been a breeze. The battery life also seems longer than average.
328.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

329.author: mandalynn
329.review: Purchased for on the go. Good computer, really light, and super fast. I always stick with Macs for their reliability and build quality I also appreciate how fast and easy it is to share documents with all of my devices for work, home, and travel. Very pleased with this purchase.
329.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

330.author: Tina007
330.review: I can never complain about Apple computers. I will say if you are not text savvy they can be a little hard to navigate but honestly for what are use it for which is mostly school and research it’s a great investment. Not only that you have geek squad to help you out to set it up and honestly just an overall five out of five stars.
330.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

331.author: Warrior
331.review: After a bad experience with a Surface Pro 4 (they can't be repaired) I decided to got with a MacBook Pro. It is everything I wanted and is perfect for school. If you can afford it spend the extra money to get the 15 inch screen. The 13 inch is fine but for the long term it may be on the small side.
331.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

332.author: BPowers
332.review: I was on the market for a new laptop for school and after going back and forth between a MacBook and a Dell laptop, I ultimately decided to go with the MacBook. I had heard a lot of great things about the MacBook and it has not disappointed. I love that it has such a long battery life!
332.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

333.author: Lilies24
333.review: Very reliable laptop, great for school work I bought this one for my daughter for her to use in school to replace her old one which was breaking apart. I know it was a wise investment since I bought the same brand 2014 and it still doing good . She is happy and liking how it works!!!!
333.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

334.author: Skycat
334.review: I have a lot of Apple stuff so I expect a lot. We do not have a laptop. Daughter wanted laptop. I only want Apple. The Best Buy Customer service person was amazingly helpful. We looked at a range of books. And chose this one. It works well better than expected. Thank you Best Buy
334.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

335.author: HikerMom
335.review: This is our second MacBook Pro. My husband bought one a few years ago and loved it. I was jealous and wanted my own. It's lightweight, portable, and easy to use. The screen looks great. The USB-C will be nice in the future, but this is our only USB-C device. So, we have to carry extra cables and power supplies.
335.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

336.author: Nicole
336.review: I'm glad I made this purchase. I love my new laptop. It's very light and the battery resistance is really good. I hardly have to charge it and I use it a lot. The customer service at the Best Buy montebello was excellent. Right away I was helped by Joshua and answered all the questions i had. He was very helpful, there should be more employees like him.
336.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

337.author: Cindy
337.review: I have been using my new Mac Pro for a few months and absolutely love it! I bought a Mac Air first and my hubby said Pro is so much better than Air - price worth the upgrades of the computer itself. I totally agree now. The Pro is thin enough to put in any of my purses and fast enough to turn on and off.
337.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

338.author: PinkCamperGirl
338.review: Very happy with my purchase, confused on memory. The sale rep said I would have plenty of room for pictures and now I only have 25 pictures on the Mac and out of memory. I have many Apple products and it feels easy to learn, still learning as I moved from a PC to a MAC. Lots of changes! Sleek. Lightweight. Fast! Great screen.
338.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

339.author: GKCantiquelady
339.review_title: I love my new Apple MacBook Pro 13"
339.review: I had a seven year old Mac laptop that I was having problems with. Even though my Geeks were trying to keep it going as long as I wanted, the time had come to purchase a new computer. I LOVE MY APPLE MACBOOK PRO 13". It is lightweight and fast. Thanks so much.
339.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

340.author: nikhil13
340.review: I bought this computer for college and it's pretty fast for normal day to day use. I am a CS major so I use it for coding and other heavy tasks, and it does all of that very smoothly. The trackpad is very large as compared to the previous models, so that's convenient. Overall, a really good choice if you're looking for something portable yet efficient.
340.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

341.author: Rachelle
341.review: We almost went with a less expensive laptop (different brand), but since our family uses Apple products already and considering the longevity of Apple, we decided to spend the extra money. We are really happy we did. This is used by the whole family. The screen is not huge, but is plenty large enough, and makes it easier to carry around.
341.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

342.author: HandyDaddy
342.review_title: A decent notebook with great graphic display
342.review: I bought this MacBook for my daughter for her school work. I like the Intel i5 processor. It's fast and reliable but I wish for the price I paid, Apple would allocate more hard drive space for this computer. Space is very cheap these days so I am not sure why Apple is so stingy with it. Apple needs to address this issue with their computers.
342.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

343.author: Herrickdv
343.review: Bought this for my daughter replacing a 6 year old MacBook Pro. as expected, my daughter loves this computer. slimmer than the previous Model but full of computing power as expected from a Mac. Only thing is you have to buy an external drive to access CD or DVD plus USB ports. You get your moneys worth.
343.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

344.author: KEVC54
344.review:
Bought this for my Wife and our Anniversary. She has taken to this device like a Duck to Water and has been productive in her Genealogy research.

The MacBook is pricey and comes with NO traditional USB port. An adapter must be bought in order to interface with anything USB.

Outside of that, it works just fine.
344.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

345.author: Jason
345.review_title: The best laptop I have ever used.
345.review: This is the first time I use a Macbook. When I bought the Mac, I am a little worried about whether I can be used to the MacBook. But after use of several days, I realized that anyone can get used to MacBook very quickly. It is totally worth to pay for the best design and usability.
345.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

346.author: johnkchiu
346.review: If you have to buy a Mac, at least this one doesn't break the bank. For the specs, it's a okay performance machine that's good enough for everyday use. Don't expect CPU intensive stuff to run well on this level of device tho. Also, it has 128GB of storage is little tight.
346.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

347.author: Doc1
347.review_title: Great Laptop. Has everything I need!
347.review:
Terrific laptop. Easy to use. Very intuitive and reliable.

Fast and impressive. Lightweight and easy to travel with.

Keyboard has nice touch and touchpad eliminates the need for a mouse.

Mac computers have alway been my favorite and this computer does not disappoint,
347.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

348.author: Kate
348.review: Unfortunately my MacBook died after less than a year of light use. I used it maybe once a week. I don’t know why it happened, I went to turn it on and it was just dead. I’ve tried all the tricks to get it back on with the help of Apple and nothing works.
348.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

349.author: MicroscopeMan
349.review: Confidently Apple handsomely efficient! This product is 100% apple tried and true. It’s handsome and efficient operation makes this highly desirable. The lightweight design makes it easy to hold while using. And as always your Apple products are integrated and synchronized to your other Apple devices which makes this a major plus!
349.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

350.author: Usman
350.review: This is a great bang for the buck. The fast processor combined with the SSD and crisp sharp display is all I wanted from this new macbook. I am greatly pleased with my purchase and it has been running flawlessly since. I will recommend this laptop to everyone looking for a mid range laptop that is highly reliable.
350.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

351.author: Margie
351.review:
Retina is great,computer is fast
Great battery life 8-10 hours of heavy use between charges
Wakes up quickly
It feels and looks great not to heavy
receiving and sending text messages and making and receiving phone calls on the MacBook works so long as the iPhone is nearby
351.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

352.author: aadaayy
352.review: I bought this computer for business and school and personal use, it’s held up as much as i put towards It, the only thing that want to add is the storage isn’t the best but a simple portable SSD did the trick instead of spending much more money than needed.
352.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

353.author: Buyer
353.review: This MacBook pro is not all that. I’m new to MacBook so it was hard to navigate. I honestly prefer a windows laptop over Mac. Plus, my Mac keeps freezing up on me occasionally. Need to take it in for checkup and it’s only been a few weeks after I purchased it.
353.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

354.author: Veganintheroom
354.review: After more than 20 years with ms, I finally got tired of the constant and long software updates required to keep me safe. I took the plunge with this computer. I have used it for six months with an external mouse and keyboard and external monitor. I am still getting used to software but am glad I switched.
354.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

355.author: Wojo56
355.review: My family is all Apple products and adding this iMac to the household was just a great added bonus. Fast smooth and larger storage capacity that Mac Book Pro, so we can place all pictures on one device (with backup of course). If you love Apple products then you won’t be disappointed by adding the iMac!
355.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

356.author: bones
356.review_title: This is my second Apple Laptop; I love it.
356.review: I love the Intel Core i5 processor. It runs even the most crazy multimedia applications, and its 2GB of RAM allows me to switch between programs pretty qucikly. The 64GB drive on this badboy has no moving parts for silent operation. This is my second Apple Laptop and I like it even more than my first one.
356.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

357.author: Karina
357.review: Went in looking for a MacBookPro and got the best deal on an open book which was as new and less then what I would’ve ever expected. Great purchase and I’m loving my MacBookPro, never any issues with my first MacBook and hopefully the same with this new one.
357.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

358.author: CalmDownItsWhatYouPaid4
358.review: Just recently switched from Windows to Mac and so far I love it. Of course there’s some new things to get used to but that’s with every product when you switch. I love how the Retina display looks when I’m watching my videos or just browsing the web. The SSD makes it super quick to find what I need and the laptop is so lightweight!
358.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

359.author: Root
359.review: This is third mac book pro I bought. Fist for my older daughter then may other douther then my son. They love it.they use it all the time and that only thing they use.its great when they start college to get this.its use full.they also have I phone and that works very well with watch other. It's great item.
359.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

360.author: Mike
360.review: Coming from a prior surface user, I was hesitant to give up my touchscreen and also the familiar windows interface. Didn’t take long at all to get used to the Mac and couldn’t see myself going back either, in all aspects it would definitely feel like a downgrade if I did.
360.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

361.author: UmdStudent
361.review: I was nervous about purchasing a MacBook . I was back and fourth between that and a HP. The guy who actually sold it to me said he was a PC guy himself. Plus the price tag is steep . But I weighed my options and still like this better . I was also able to get my laptop price matched so I saved some money. It was overall a really good buy.
361.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

362.author: Alex88156
362.review:
I highly recommend this to anyone that’s in the market for a Apple laptop. Super fast and slim. If you use adobe products then this is perfect for you. It keeps up with heavy rendering progress. Only 2 things that I dislike. 

1. Battery life can use improvement 

2. You need to buy accessories in order to use usb cables.
362.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

363.author: itsmejacob2
363.review: I bought this for myself, since I will be starting school this fall and I started to use it for my summer classes and I have been enjoying every moment since I left the store with it! I will recommend this product to all students that are in search of a reliable laptop.
363.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

364.author: Shayla
364.review: This is my first MacBook and I must say I’m glad I made the switch! I was a little bummed out that the little Apple on this generation doesn’t glow and the fact that I need to purchase all kinds of adapters but the performance certainly makes up for it! Also the speakers are amazing, super loud and crisp sound for a laptop.
364.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

365.author: smalldude
365.review_title: Good for consumers, and basic usage.
365.review:
The biggest factor that influenced me to buy this product is its battery life. That doesn't mean it has a better or bigger battery than the competitors. It actually is software optimized.
Overall performance is great. It is responsive and reliable.
Con: my one big disappointment is that this thing heats up pretty well when using Flash Player.
365.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

366.author: Zaya
366.review: I use the word “basic” for a reason. The 128GB SSD and low performance graphics card in this specific model are the main setbacks, however the screen, battery life, keyboard, trackpad, and software definitely make up for it. If you need a laptop for school or work, do not hesitate!
366.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

367.author: arnold
367.review: My son purchased this laptop with money saved up. Since there was a sale of $200 off, it was a good deal. Instead of getting the 256gb memory, we purchased a 2TB portable drive elsewhere. Please note that the new Apple laptops doesn’t come with a USB port, therefore we purchased a USB-C Drive. All is working out so far.
367.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

368.author: SDM43
368.review: Absolutely love my MacBook Pro! I got it for college and the Best Buy associate that helped me pick it out did a wonderful job. I had a hard time deciding between the air and the pro but ended up going with the pro and certainly don’t regret it! Definitely recommend to anyone looking for a laptop!
368.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

369.author: PrincessJ
369.review: I recently upgraded from a 3 year old Hp to this laptop and I am absolutely in love! Extremely light and easy to carry around. It was slightly challenging for me to learn to use the MacBook, but there is a tutorial that teaches you how to use it which is very helpful. After having this laptop, I don't think I will go back to using an hp again.
369.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

370.author: Brinker
370.review: I've been an Apple product owner but this is the first MacBook Pro I've every purchased. Definitely glad I upgraded to purchase the Pro instead of the Air. The quality is beyond superb and its super light which makes it easy to carry around. Definitely would recommend this product to anyone! No complaints here.
370.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

371.author: Elderb96
371.review: I love the new macbooks and I can't say I have many complaints. The resolution is beautiful, the keyboard is a great size, and it is decently fast while multitasking multiple apps. The only problem I have is with the processor. You'd think the 7th gen i7 core would be standard this year. Especially considering the price of the unit.
371.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

372.author: Candi12
372.review: This is my first Macbook and i really do love it! I have always done HP but I needed something that would last longer than 2 years so my coworker talked me into it and i love it!!! It's the best laptop I've ever had for college! Highly recommend!!
372.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

373.author: Emily
373.review: I had been wanting a MacBook for a while and finally bought one for college. The computer is not to big or heavy so fits perfectly in my backpack. It does everything I need it to and I’m perfectly fine without the touch bar, I don’t feel like I’m missing out on anything without it!
373.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

374.author: Szabo
374.review: This laptop is awesome. The keyboard is the best keyboard that I've ever typed on and it has a beautiful display. The only downside is that there are only USB-C ports on the laptop, so you'll have to spend at least an extra $50 to get a normal USB port, HDMI port, etc. But it is worth it to get a laptop that is this fast and good looking.
374.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

375.author: Lena
375.review: This is my first Mac Book Pro purchase and I’m glad I did it! Got tired of the whole Windows/Internet Explorer thing! I’m a college student and needed something dependable and faster! Plus I received the student deal on top of the regular sale! Good bargain!
375.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

376.author: Lisa
376.review: I love my laptop! It’s perfect for school. At first, I was disappointed that it wasn’t touch screen but it doesn’t matter to me anymore. The internet speed is extreme fast and the picture quality is amazing. I love everything about this laptop.
376.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

377.author: Lindsay
377.review: As a student, I was hesitant purchasing this product because of the hefty price tag, but it has superseded my expectations. It operates very fast and the graphics are quite sharp. However, I am not a fan of how I need adaptors for everything and that it does not easily connect with my android phone. Overall, it is great product though.
377.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

378.author: Quail
378.review: I had to get a new laptop for school and what better choice than Apple? I had purchased a gaming laptop not even a year prior with hopes I'd be able to game during my downtime while on campus, but the battery life was absolutely terrible and it wasn't practical for a student. I'm very happy with this laptop.
378.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

379.author: strugglinghighschoolkid
379.review: My parents have always used dell or hp laptops, but they were always crashing and had tons of viruses, but with the MacBook Pro its a completely new experience. The MacBook Pro is just so much more convenient and high tech than the Microsoft wired laptops that I've used in the past.
379.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

380.author: Jeff
380.review: Went shopping for my first laptop... and this was the one I bought! I’m so happy I did! You really don’t need a touchbar. I’m glad I bought a laptop that can do many things. This is great for video editing. Watching movies on this is awesome.
380.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

381.author: ScottO
381.review:
Got this primarily as a tablet that cold be pressed ino laptop service. It's a great tablet, and still a respectable laptop. Prefer this to the two in ones that try to be both equally well and are compromiss for both (like the HP Spectre).
Even the added keyboard and pen cost keeps the price in line.
381.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

382.author: Brandon
382.review_title: Great computer. Thin, lite, and it’s a mac
382.review: I’ve enjoyed this computer. I miss the ports of my old MacBook Pro, but I can get over that. Apple makes great products. If you need a good laptop and want to pay a little more for quality and something that will last a while, get a MacBook Pro
382.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

383.author: bivbeas
383.review: very first time buying my own laptop and I'm so happy with it. The battery life is great. I'm still learning my way around it but I'm so in love with it. the financing program they've set up is so convenient for a student that cant afford to spend a whole 2,000 in one day.
383.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

384.review: The size is a great benefit and the clarity of the screen is acceptional. Obviously the operating system is Apple which is much preferred over Windows based system. Keyboard is very functional and comfortable to use. Battery life is good! Absolutely recommend!
384.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

385.author: Pikachu
385.review: Computer is very fast and useful. Was skeptical at first because of the high price, out-of-box condition, and new USB-C ports only. Had to buy an adapter to plug in iPhone, HDMI, and USB, but still would have had to with MacBook Air too. Overall, happy and hoping it lasts longer than my previous MacBook Pro (2012, 5-year life)
385.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

386.author: Angel999
386.review:
I really like this MacBook, it's compact, solid and powerful. There are things that I didn't like, though, like:
The lack of MagSafe connector,
The apple logo is not glowing
You need an adapter to plug a conventional USB drive or cable.
386.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

387.author: Shivi1394
387.review: I have used a hp laptop, before this one and this is till now the best device ever. Being a computer science student, I have to code a lot, and I like how Mac gives such a good environment to work in as well as it has a good processing speed.
387.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

388.author: Mitzi
388.review: I am amazed by all the things this computer can do. I'm planning a multimedia presentation with images and sound to be projected on a movie screen. The Keynote program on this computer will make it so much better than a plain old Power Point presentation.
388.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

389.author: KKLO
389.review: This laptop is serving me so well. I finally upgraded from my 2010 MBP after it completely died. This is so much lighter, and I can comfortably carry it in my work shoulder bag or in a book bag. It is a good size for travel and to still do typing, web surfing and reading on. The sound is excellent!
389.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

390.author: AppleLover
390.review: I just love my new Macbook. This one is so much lighter than the 2011 model I replaced. It crashed unexpectedly and I purchased this one the same day. Got a great sale during one of their slowest weeks of the year, and I had the student discount coupon. Great buy at Best Buy!
390.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

391.author: HECTORISM
391.review:
I'VE HAD MINE FOR 2 MONTHS 
IT'S A GREAT PRODUCT BUT I HAVE A FEW CONS
FIRST NO USB ONLY USB-C 
SECOND MY SPACE BAR WAS ACTING UP ALREADY AND MY SCREEN HAS A QUICK LITTLE DEFECT WHEN YOU OPEN IT UP 
ALSO MY BATTERY CORD SEEMS WORN ALREADY IT'S NOT SNUG ON THE POWER UNIT 
BUT YEA HEY NOTHING IS PERFECT
391.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

392.author: Sara0327
392.review:
MacBook Pro is one of the best laptops around. Depending on how much storage you actually need, the mos tminimum amount will work great for anyone. 
Out of 6 years with macs, I have never had any major issues (except for battery dying out and need for an upgrade).
392.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

393.author: michelep
393.review: The MacBook Pro is awesome! Easy to use. And the best thing about it is no viruses. I have purchased many laptops over the years and after a few months they were full of viruses. Not the MacBook. I bought my daughter one a few years ago and I recently bought my son one. No issues with either of them.
393.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

394.author: AngelBabe
394.review: Got this computer for my grandson in college. We had to exchange the Mac for a Windows computer. The Mac wouldn't work with his courses he was taking. The college wanted him to have the Windows. He really liked the Windows computer. All worked out for the best.
394.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

395.author: Hardy
395.review: I purchased my first MacBook Pro and was extremely pleased with the service the Best Buy sales representative provided. He was very knowledgeable about the product and was patient with me while I asked many questions. I love my MacBook Pro and I’m certainly happy with my purchase and experience!
395.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

396.author: BigU
396.review: Transitioned from a Windows laptop to the MacBook Pro and while there is a little bit of a learning curve I couldn’t be happier with my decision. Fast, lightweight, solid and intuitive are just a few words that come to mind. If you are thinking about making the change, think no longer, just do it!
396.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

397.author: RAMJR
397.review: Purchased as an adjunct to my lap top running 10. Previously used Mac back in the 90s when PCs ran DOS; pre- PowerPoint. Great graphics platform. Moving some critical items over with added external storage and disk drive. Added office and will run parallel. Drop financial data seems to be seamless with my institutions. Love it.
397.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

398.author: gbcman
398.review:
I use my MacBook Pro for web design, creating web pages, translating content and processing word documents and so far it handled it well!
I like the size of it too, especially when traveling.
Wished Apple would keep at least one usb port...in case I left my handy adapter at home/hotel.
398.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

399.author: Predsfan75
399.review: So happy decided to finally join the MacBook family. Very quick machine and very well made. The screen clarity and quality surpassed my expectations and Daughter uses Microsoft Office applications for high school with no problems. Only issue is now I want one for me!
399.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

400.author: Jay23
400.review: No complaints. However, if you are planning on installing Microsoft Windows onto your MacBook I would highly recommend the 256gb storage option. Windows will honestly take a little less than your storage (70GB).
