400.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

401.author: APman
401.review: Feels good in the hands, makes you want to use it longer. I wish it performed better, had more than 8gb ram. MAC OS seems a bit outdated to me. I wish Apple could fuse IOS functionality with OS capability, and allow all that on an iMac. I’m a creative and would love to use full versions of Adobe CC programs on an iPad.
401.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

402.author: Mick
402.review: This is a great laptop and a bargain price. The battery runtime is NO JOKE! You can be on the laptop ALL DAY before needing to plug in and, the mag-safe charger keeps your laptop from flying off the table if someone trips on the cord.
402.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

403.author: Tole
403.review: My granddaughter not only appreciated her gift, but has let me know how well it's working for her in her scholastic endeavors. I already have a Mac Pro, but am thinking of upgrading, or upgrading to the new iPad Pro. I am quite happy and satisfied with my Apple products and there helpful team, when I need help.
403.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

404.author: bargainshopper
404.review:
Apple did a great job with this laptop. I enjoy using this as much as my iPad. Works flawlessly with the rest of my Apple devices.

Comparing the price to a new iPad, why not get this? Especially if you have an older iPad to fall back on.
404.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

405.author: Venkat
405.review_title: Apple MacBook Pro 13-Inch (2017) is best laptop..
405.review:
After spending quite a time reviewing the premium laptops both Windows and Apple, I finally decided to buy Apple MacBook Pro 13-Inch (2017) and I am quite happy with the purchase.
MacBook lasts for 5 years. No virus issues. Sleek, durable and good battery backup with the standard premium laptops configuration
405.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

406.author: spad3
406.review: Sleek device, first Mac I ever bought. I'm a PC guy and will stay a PC guy when it comes to Desktops, but this Macbook is super sleek. I love the weight, the feel, and the design. Really pricey for the specs it offers though. You're literally paying for aesthetic.
406.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

407.author: TRIKEMAN
407.review: Like all the features and size. Able to to everything my desktop does. But very disappointed is the battery life. Was expecting a lot more life than what I’m getting. Used it for about an hour today and down to 53% already. Just a little bill paying and scrolling news articles. Are the all this way?
407.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

408.author: 27John
408.review: I love it! I been tired of PCs for years with the constant slowness with every update. The only down fall to this Apple computer is the ports but all I need it for is usb so it’s not a big deal. It’s also a learning cure for sure when you haven’t had an Apple computer before.
408.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

409.author: Shay
409.review:
The customer service was fine. Tech guy was very knowledgeable about all products that I inquired about. 

I was really upset when this exact same computer went on sale less than a week after my full-price purchase. I wish I would have been informed about the upcoming sales.
409.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

410.author: Dragon
410.review: My old Mac Book Pro completely died and had to buy a new one. I just started using this new version. So far so good!! I like how light weight it is compared to the other one I had. I am still learning the new features but I am happy with my purchase at this point!
410.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

411.author: teton
411.review:
Let me give you the Pros and Cons.
Pros:
Very loud speakers
Keyboard is pretty good.
Trackpad does not disappoint.
Display is very bright.
Build Quality feels great
Performance is pretty good. 
Cons:
Requires Type C adapters for non usb C accessories. I use hdmi and usb a lot, so it's a huge deal for me.
411.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

412.author: Erica760
412.review: As a long time Apple user I decided to purchase a new Mac book to upgrade from my air . I had my air since 2015 and never had 1 single issue I just wanted to upgrade . This computer is so fast and has an amazing sleek look to it . I couldn’t get through college without my Apple products !
412.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

413.author: Jaybap
413.review: What more can you ask for? Got this open box and it was basically like new. I have not had any issues with this at all. The new keyboard on the Macs took some getting used but now I can't even think about going back to the old one. Not much more you can say about the screen but it is amazing.
413.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

414.author: Juni
414.review: First macbook delivered to home was damaged during delivery. Best Buy exchanged. MacBook is beautiful!!!! Quality product. The speed is great. If you're gonna spend this kind of money buy a Mac. No other computer brand even compares. I also have a surface pro and it's beautiful but macs are still a notch above in quality
414.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

415.author: TonyM
415.review: Bought this for my daughter who is a freshman in high school and is all into Apple products. The MacBook Pro connects very well to her iPhone and other Apple products. As far as performance, the MacBook Pro is built well enough to last her through her high school and college years.
415.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

416.author: Jamartty45
416.review: This laptop is perfect for college. It's small enough to where it's not a distraction or too big for the desks in giant lecture halls. The battery life is insane and everything is snappy. I was a little bit iffy about switching to OSX due to always been a windows user but for portability this thing is wonderful.
416.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

417.author: sarahe
417.review: We are definitely happy with our purchase of the Macbook Pro. Its pretty, its fast, its smooth. The only downfall is getting used to the Mac OS. We actually had a technical issue in the second week and Apple took care of it and sent it back to our house free of charge. Very happy with the service we got.
417.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

418.author: Raff
418.review: This is my first experience with a MacBook Pro. I needed something that was light and durable and that I can carry around with me wherever I go. The MacBook Pro surpassed my expectations and so I bought another one for my wife!
418.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

419.author: abhisummi
419.review_title: Very good macbook pro with few cons
419.review:
the new macbook pro 2017 is very good. The cons are it has low hard drive space and cannot be upgraded. The usb-c ports are a disaster. Had to buy the usb-c to usb adapters and also a microsd adapter. The ports are all jacked up.
Other than that, everything is fabulous. the screen is very good and feels awesome.
419.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

420.author: MIguel
420.review: I know that many people will go with the traditional laptop with Windows, but I had a Surface #4 and I was not impressed. I had a lot updates and the computer shut down without warning. I had a Mac Air without any issues for a long time, and I decided to change it for something with more power. I love my Mac Pro
420.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

421.author: Roughtong
421.review: We have a MacBook Air, which works great, we thought we would go ahead & try out the Pro since they had a huge sale & it was an open box so we paid the same price as an Air costs. Warning though. Only has 2 Lightning ports. No longer has USB.
421.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

422.author: Newbiemacuser
422.review: I am a convert from pc to mac. I didn't expect to have such an easy transition and to enjoy the mac so much. It is extremely fast and so much simpler than pc. I run a company off this unit and the battery does not have to be charged all day. I charge it at night and I'm good to go the next day.
422.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

423.author: Ssloan123
423.review: I recently upgraded from my older MacBook Pro, and I am in love with my new computer. The graphics are amazing, the ease of transfer of all my information from my previous MacBook Pro to my current one. The computer is so much lighter, and easier to use. Love the overall functionality of the new MacBook Pro.
423.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

424.author: Tupai
424.review_title: Very good laptop, but still very over priced
424.review: I've been using mac for a very long time, and my old mbp is dying so time to buy a new one. Every time I in market to purchase one, I can't help but think why windows sucks for development! Mac is very overpriced, but I love mac OS as my dev+entertainment environment... So I ended up buying a mac again.
424.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

425.author: Bobcat14
425.review: Needed a computer for a summer home and opted not to have a desk so bought my first laptop. Since I have a Mac desktop, IPad and IPhone it was just natural,that I get a MacBook, although I did look at other options. Also considered the 15" but for my needs it was. It worth the extra $. I am happy with my decision.
425.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

426.author: Comp
426.review: This model of MacPro is more than my expectation. I really recommend it. I am not exaggerated. Very fast, very user-friendly design. Never get regret. Honestly all my life I have been using Windows and Intel Desktop. But after using Mac Pro I have changed my mind.
426.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

427.author: jatitus
427.review: I traded it for my windows machine, which was absolutely beautiful on its own. But there’s something nice about the whole os software that’s just always pleasant. You won’t be disappointed, it’s over priced and we all know it, but my use of the machine the last few weeks I’d say makes it worth it
427.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

428.author: RobP
428.review_title: Excellent laptop at a great price
428.review: Top of the line MacBook Pro at a phenomenal price. It's so worth it to upgrade to the newest model for the price difference. I was thinking of getting the MacBook Air, but after doing the research, the MacBook Pro is the future, so I decided for the minimal difference in price I should get the Pro
428.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

429.author: RCKA
429.review: The overall build and performance is good. Not much difference between the the Air and Pro though if you're a daily normal user. Only negative is we have to buy USB-C converters for everything, things can get real messy here.
429.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

430.author: mrcomputeruser
430.review_title: Great compact computer with unlimited potential.
430.review: Very pleased with my purchase. This laptop has all the features I need to be a productive user. Followed other reviews and made a right choice. Best Buy staff very helpful describing the benefits of MacBook Pro versus other brands. Thanks for your help.
430.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

431.author: Waseem
431.review: So for excellent performance. I purchased for college student. I purchased it on regular price but still worth it . It says with its specification “Latest model “. I am not agreed with it because after that there is one model came in which is work as touch screen. Other than that there is no problem at all.
431.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

432.author: David
432.review_title: Easy to use laptop and great for students
432.review: I was a little reluctant to buy this laptop because I had a 15 inch MacBook Pro prior. The size of the this 13 inch MacBook concerned me, but after using it in class I realized that it is the perfect size. it's extremely light and the keyboard is easy to get used to. It is a great laptop for students.
432.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

433.author: Dani
433.review: I have always been a Mac lover. My lasted MacBook Pro last 7 years and it still works. I recently upgraded just for faster speeds. I wish Apple didn't do the one type of port thing because I have to purchase so many converters(HDMI, USB, VGA) but its not a deal breaker for me.
433.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

434.author: Andie
434.review: I have only had for a week but so far enjoy it more than my Lenovo windows laptop. I am hoping the investment in Mac allows for longer lifespan. easy to setup and navigate, charges very quickly and stays charged for hours. photoshop is great for this laptop also and keyboard makes for faster typing.
434.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

435.author: caitlin
435.review_title: great product, nothing less from apple
435.review: i'm not the apple junky my parents are, but the connectivity from phone to laptop is one of the biggest things that makes keeping multiple apple items around worthwhile. the laptop itself runs amazingly, is light enough to take to classes, and serves all of the needs i have for a laptop (with some perks)!
435.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

436.author: JamesT
436.review_title: Perfect replacement for my aging Air
436.review: As Apple has given less attention to upgrading the MacBook Air, it's clear they intend to replace it with the MacBook and MacBook Pro. This fits my needs as I don't require using ports very often. The design is amazing and I love the space gray. The beautiful screen has also been a huge upgrade from my old Air.
436.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

437.author: vaibhav
437.review:
This is my first Mac and I am pleasantly surprised by the re-freshness it brings after years of using Windows.
Windows laptops are great, don't get me wrong but once you get over the steep curve of transitioning over to MacOS it feels intuitive.
437.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

438.author: Trev24
438.review: After havinga Dell desktop previously, we decided to purchase a laptop this time. Since we have always appreciated the reliability of Apple products, we started looking at MacBooks. We decided on this item based on reviews and the sale at the time. So far it has been a great purchase. It's fast and reliable.
438.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

439.author: abbyrose
439.review: I started college and didn't want to spend too much on a computer. The MacBook Pro is perfect. It is light and convenient to carry to classes. I feel good about the quality of the product and expect it will work great for years.
439.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

440.author: Viking
440.review: This is a replacement for an 8 year old model my son used thru college. Now, in graduate school needs something to keep up “speedwise”. The other one still works great but has slowed...awesome products so we bought another.
440.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

441.author: Asherz
441.review: I had a macbook pro previously and loved it - just needed an upgrade. I was almost going to get the macbook pro with the touchbar but decided that it was not worth the extra $500. I can live without that. You get what you pay for with this product. I use it for school and browsing the web and it works excellent.
441.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

442.author: Dianna411
442.review: Anthony really was a wonderful gel with helping me select MacBook, printer, extension, etc! He took all of my needs into consideration and helped me get the best items for what I need them for! Top notch!!
442.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

443.author: KittyKate
443.review: This is my first Apple product. So far, it meets my expectations, need to figure out how to transfer photos from Android phone but it looks doable. I'm satisfied so far. Seems weird not to have a touch screen, but the graphics are great so I'm happy with it.
443.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

444.author: ronbon29
444.review: My daughter has only used iPhone's. This will allow her to interchange at college between her phone and computer, her music library & photos. Because of her iphone use, it was so easy to use her computer. She was able to completely set it up on her own. No help needed! The clarity in the screen is incredible.
444.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

445.author: Suri
445.review: I bought a 128 GB MacBook Pro for my undergraduate study. The hardware quality is pretty good. The USB Adapter is easy to use. But I recommend Selecting the Storage carefully while purchasing. Maybe 256 GB is a better choice for you if you need to download many applications and information on the laptop.
445.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

446.author: Pavelascom
446.review:
Great Lightweight compact machine for everyday computing needs.
I bought this last week, and haven't had a great deal of time to use it. But because I am so confident on Apple's guarantees, I have no worry about quality.
446.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

447.author: Jayz
447.review_title: The Hardware in Apple is Old and Overpriced
447.review: It went on sale and I had a need for programming so I picked this up. It works fine but the hardware in it is old and the computer is overpriced. You can hear the fans buzzing like crazy when you push it too hard.
447.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

448.author: Neftali1215
448.review: I went with the base model for a few reasons. The i5 processor and 8Gbs of Ram are good enough for Lightroom and everyday tasks. Also the 128gb is sufficient to install the programs I need. I keep everything else stored on my external SSD to avoid slowing down the Laptop. Everything about the laptop is great.
448.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

449.author: vkvk
449.review_title: Fantastic price, it was off almost $300
449.review: I bought macbook pro from bestbuy. Product itself is fantastic by Apple's lofty standards. However, what made me buy was the price discount.It was less by almost $300 or so. Ordering and shopping experience overall was great at BestBuy. Keep up the good work.
449.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

450.author: MRM7
450.review: This is an excellent MacBook. It's so much faster than my last MacBook Pro and feels like it's half the weight. I got it for a great price too using Best Buy's price match and by trading in my old MacBook. I have no complaints at all. You should get one!
450.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

451.author: Miken08
451.review: The quality of the products is as always as expected from Apple. Great response, the solid state drive is fast from the previous model, love the usb c despite the controversy of its use and the Mac OS system is extremely solid, forgetting windows already !!!!
451.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

452.author: Tammykayy
452.review: I’ve had my MacBook for about a year now. I use it for nursing school and it works for everything plus more that I need. EXCELLENT graphics, speed, etc. Way worth the chunk of change. I, myself had cheap $200 laptops before my MacBook the only lasted maybe 6-8 months and they’d crash.
452.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

453.author: taylorc
453.review: This is my first Apple computer product. I was a skeptical PC user for years, but I have really found that this computer is user friendly. Having to buy an extension for the charger and the adapter for various inputs is a downside, but once you have all of those necessary items, this computer is great.
453.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

454.author: Jeremiah
454.review: Picked this Pro in lieu of an air for the screen quality. The OLED is absolutely beautiful. Also a big fan of the battery life. We get several hours of unplugged time between charge, and if shut, can run in idle for days without a charge. Absolutely love it!
454.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

455.author: Angel
455.review_title: Good but miss the old Macbook
455.review:
This Macbook Pro is great, fast, easy to carry, great screen.
Still I miss some of the other things I had in my previous Macbook Air: USB (no need of adapter), MagSafe charger, Illuminated logo on the back.
I wish I could have this new processor, screen and technology with the above things.
455.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

456.author: Mmacias
456.review: This is my first MacBook and I was excited to buy it and use it and now that I have I really like it besides it only having two USB-C ports and I feel like the battery drains way too fast and it overheats when I have more than 3 windows on safari open.
456.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

457.author: Ya196
457.review: The new MacBook Pro meets all the requirements that I ask of it. I also started using the iLife applications such as Pages, Keynote, Numbers, etc. and must say with the MacBook Pro they work more intuitively and seamlessly. The MacBook Pro is fast, sleek, and just an enjoyable all around experience.
457.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

458.author: Bjb4321
458.review_title: Connects easily to my other apple items
458.review: This product has been easy to get adjusted to being that I am a senior citizen and this is my first iPad. I was pleased that it connected easily with my printer, iPad and iPhone . I only wish I had purchased a size larger because the screen is so small. So far that is my only complaint.
458.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

459.author: Willy
459.review_title: Great computer. Light, Fast, Easy to Use
459.review: I like this computer because it's powerful enough for spreadsheets, word processing, modest games (it would need more ram to play the most popular first person shooter games and driving/sports games). I give it style points too. I think it looks cool.
459.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

460.author: djzh1327
460.review: Laptop has a good battery life and is very easy to use. It's light enough to carry around to wherever you need. However, after two weeks of use, I had to bring it back to the store for it to be fixed as it wouldn't charge anymore even with a new charger.
460.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

461.author: Klokwork
461.review: This is the second Apple laptop I bought. I bought one for myself or year ago and I was very impressed so for my fiancé’s birthday I bought her one and she’s very happy with the picture is just beautiful and it works great if it fills all of the needs we have.
461.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

462.author: Dollbaby
462.review: I wanted to purchase an Apply MACBook laptop for a while. Good things come to those who wait, because as you know from this review I purchased the Apple MacBook Pro 13" the latest Model and the Hyperdrive Thunderbolt for additional USB support. This laptop is light weight and the speed is excellent.
462.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

463.author: TiaP
463.review: Bought the Apple Mac book pro for school while needing a laptop that will last for a while. I was deciding between another Windows or Apple and decided to go with Apple after talking to friends and sales reps. so far I have not been disappointed and I can not wait to see how it does when school starts.
463.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

464.author: Stefan
464.review: This computer is excellent for the basics. However, I find the lack of connections and transition to USB-C quite annoying, especially when using an external hard drive and editing products such as Adobe. Overall, wish I had upgraded rather than buying the base model.
464.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

465.author: Saby
465.review: Best laptop for price considering the functionality and the battery. Quick startup and ao dar no issues with the software installations. I have a surface 2 but it still lags in intuitiveness of the software. Only con is the usb drives they are all usb-c atleast one of them should have been normal usb
465.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

466.author: Mohamad
466.review: I was looking for a very fast but inexpensive laptop for my school and work. I went with the MacBook and it does not fail me! Customer service was very helpful in helping me come up with my decision in purchasing it!
466.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

467.author: GHouse
467.review: Bought this for my sons graduation. Upgraded from an HP he had previous for 6 years. Nothing wrong with HP, just needed a product that he could utilize for his courses. This particular Mac is comparable to the newer models with sensor bar and i7 core.Just less expensive but will do the job equally as well.
467.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

468.author: Steve
468.review_title: High Quality but a Higher Price
468.review: My sisters purchased this computer for my mom for Christmas and she loves it. Everything you'd expect from an Apple product. However, I still believe that the brand surcharge for Apple products is not justified in quality and capability. If money is not a concern, Apple is the way to go.
468.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

469.author: Marblenut
469.review_title: What a great upgrade, very satisfied
469.review: This was a upgrade from our previous model we purchased four years ago. Super fast and videos download quickly, lightweight and slim compact design make it easy to transport. So many feature upgrades from our older model. Very satisfied and would recommend this purchase to anyone
469.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

470.author: kalps
470.review:
Good Points
Superb speed : after switching on within 3-4 secs its started working. 
Never Hanged
Amaze Look
Light weight
Compact Model
Touchpad is nice

Cons: 
Not touchscreen
Once when i logged in after 7 days it was giving hitting issue, but later never faced the same issue
470.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

471.author: Captain
471.review: I got this for my son as a going to college present. It has all features he will need for college, especially music applications. The resolution of the screen is amazing. Battery life seems to be ok. One month into college and no complaints from him about it, so I would say it was a good purchase.
471.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

472.author: Jwalker
472.review: This is my first time stepping outside of Microsoft products, this computer is fast and friendly to use, its so many great features and I just got pass using my email and other apps. I highly recommend this computer
472.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

473.author: Ana12
473.review:
Really love my new MacBook, but I’m still getting used to the programs that are way different from my previous windows laptop. I just wished I would have purchase the 256GB rather than the 128GB,but I just invested in an external hard drive. 
Very happy with this purchase!
473.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

474.author: Emily
474.review: I have always gotten Dell computers so the decision to get this computer wasn't easy. BUT I AM SO GLAD THAT I GOT IT. Yes it is expensive, but it is so worth it. I love how fast and light weight it is. The battery life is wonderful. It is great for school. I wish I had switched to Apple sooner.
474.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

475.author: Vapeguy
475.review: Love this MacBook Pro runs all the office programs I need it to as I'm a business owner. keyboard is very responsive and very nice updated speakers a lot louder than previous model. Display is super crisp and all my programs and apps run smooth as butter, love this new addition to my office.
475.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

476.author: techtalker86
476.review: The display is nice and sharp and the computer is very speedy with its fast solid state storage. The thermal management on this computer is pretty lacking, though. It does tend to get hot and spin up the fans noisily under workload, but nothing that wouldn't be expected out of an ultraportable.
476.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

477.author: gubs1957
477.review: I had previously had 2 different PC’s because they were purchased/given to me. My first computer was aMac c and I always wanted to go back to the Mac platform. I LOVE my computer and the ease of operation. It cost me more than a PC, but it’s worth every dime!! Very happy with my purchase.
477.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

478.author: theengles
478.review: Upgraded from a 2014 MacBook Air to the Pro and I am very pleased with this purchase. Love the size and feel of it, such a well built laptop and the performance is great. If you are considering a MacBook air, i would definitely look at the MacBook pro as it is smaller and of similar weight.
478.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

479.author: WayneB
479.review: Overall this was one of the best purchase I’ve ever made, it a great computer for school and work. It so lite weight I always forgot I have it with me. I would gladly buy the same computer, pulse there is a coupon that you can use if your a student to get a discount.
479.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

480.author: Angela
480.review: I had looked up which MacBook I had wanted and when I got to the store I had found out they weren't producing that model anymore. So I had to choose a different laptop. I chose the MacBook Pro and I'm satisfied with my decision. It is super fast and can do everything I need it to do for college
480.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

481.author: Phina
481.review_title: Great investment for high schoolers/ college kids
481.review: This is our fifth Mac purchase for the household. Takes a brief moment to acclimate if you are a PC user. Newer models come with new ports that require additional adapters to use USBs. Plug in also is new and can’t be used with prior model plugs. Mac though is great against viruses.
481.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

482.author: Nickname
482.review: If you had any hesitations from switching from a Windows platform to Mac OS... Do it! You definitely won't regret it. Built well, and a work horse. Of course it's so expensive... But, sales run regularly and for the same price as the normal Macbook, the Pro is a no brainer.
482.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

483.author: NDmom
483.review: Went with the silver after comparison shopping in the store because of the higher quality look. I had also read that if the space grey scratches, silver is revealed beneath. Excellent picture resolution/quality and sound! This MacBook Pro is highly recommended.
483.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

484.author: kater16123
484.review_title: Plenty of speed and storage & exceptional quality
484.review: I am attending college and using the laptop for research and writing papers. In my down time I watch movies and videos without buffering problems. There is plenty of room for opening multiple browsers and documents. Excellent choice after months of decision making.
484.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

485.author: EliteCM
485.review: I was looking for a laptop for college and although this one was a bit pricey it was well worth it. I am able to do all my schoolwork and much more whether it comes to editing or backing up my iPhone, it really gets the job done.
485.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

486.review: I like the MacBook Pro because it is efficient and easy to transport. Most of the time it fits into my purse. Also, there was $100 discount at the time.
486.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

487.author: Lizzie
487.review_title: very user friendly plus great memory
487.review: I never had a Mac before and am loving this one. The screen image quality is fantastic and the laptop feels really solid. I bought Applecare when I bought the laptop wiith a good deal offered by BestBuy, so I feel as though I will have someone expert to turn to if any problems should arise.
487.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

488.author: Marilyn
488.review: I'm in love with my MacBook Pro for its sleek and stylish look, not forgetting the quality and it's perfect size. The first time I used it, it gotten so hot to the point where it froze. I was scared that it was the end of my computer, it is working better now and I hope it don't happen again.
488.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

489.author: jay123
489.review: I have been an apple user since the Iphone 4 came out. so when I started going to college I needed a laptop and brought this macbook. I am very glad to brought this, it runs well and i can use the apps on my phone to the macbook.
489.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

490.author: Kayla
490.review: I really like this laptop, it gets what I need done. It’s fast and connects well. My only problem is that it’s like every other Apple product, you have to buy adapters and what nots to accommodate for different things. But it works well
490.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

491.author: Justin
491.review_title: Awesome! wish there was more space
491.review: Love this computer! Everything about it works great. the only problem I have with it is that mine only has 128g. I wish apple would make their lowest storage a little higher for the price. It really would not be asking that much to get 256 or even in the 500g range for the price.
491.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

492.author: jcm2016
492.review: Battery life is great. Images on the screen are clear. Pretty easy to use. This is a great computer and you can do so many things on it. I also have it connected to my iPhone so I can also call text and FaceTime from here too.
492.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

493.author: Filo
493.review: I bought this laptop for my junior year of college because my old one just gave out on me. So far, I have had no issues at all and am loving it. The keyboard is great which is important to me since I'm an English major and will be writing a lot.
493.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

494.author: 865309yooper
494.review: The latest Macbook Pro is absolutely outstanding. It's at the level of this Macintosh I've had used before . I'm very happy with this purchase. I've been using this for my school work at a community college.
494.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

495.author: kbella
495.review: This is the same laptop we bought for our other child two years ago. It has everything they need for school work and research and also great for streaming shows and everything else internet related. Should go nicely into college. Also, very thin and compact for easy transport.
495.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

496.author: diablo310
496.review:
Mac book pro 13 inch bought while on promotion saved $$ 
MacBook pro is the best light weight powerful laptop for your everyday needs anywhere from music to work presentations 
fast , efficient , Reliable 
Key elements of a Great laptop
496.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

497.author: Flaky
497.review: My daughter he loves it. My son gets this for school and loves it. Very good laptop and easy to carry. The price is average but it worth it. I have a different brand laptop and is already giving me problems and is not too old.
497.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

498.author: Tech1
498.review: Where did all the plugs go? I still have FireWire 9-pin external drives due to Apple in the early 2000’s. Not loving the new plug and definitely not loving the two only. I did one job on it. No crashes as expected. Going to find a 2015 MacBook Pro instead
498.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

499.author: EjCam
499.review: My wife and I share for 2 completely different tasks. I use it for my restaurant; numbers,pages, keynote (very comparable to Office). She uses it for our family camera a T-6 and she loves the accessibility. Having all apple products definitely helps comparability.
499.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

500.author: Nadoue
500.review: The Apple MacBook Pro is the best product I have ever purchased and I will never use any other product. My daughter have had hers for 5 years & never experienced a single issue which prompted me to get one for myself.
500.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

501.author: BubbaND
501.review: I love this little laptop. I take it with me everywhere. It is super quick and does great with video and photo editing. It is a little slow when it comes to 4K editing but it does what it needs to do. I'd say this is the perfect computer for a college student.
501.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

502.author: CJINLA
502.review_title: Excellent for my college freshman son
502.review: My Son had a MacBook Air which he utilized in high school for several years. As a college freshman, he (told me he) needed a new computer to help him work more efficiently. As such, I bought him this MacBook Pro which he likes because it has a much faster processor and more memory.
502.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

503.author: Russak211
503.review: After looking around at all the PC sale for college we decided on the MacBook. Great display and great speakers. Speed is good. Should be good for a few years before upgrade.
503.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

504.author: xadrianfx
504.review: This product has allowed me to become very successful in both my academic and personal pursuits. I am glad to have found that the customer service when purchasing this was exquisite. I followed the reccomendations of the employee and have not had any issues. Thanks Best Buy.
504.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

505.author: WorkoutFriendly
505.review: Great Apple product with awesome processing power and your classic interlink between all apple products. This device includes the USB and HDMI ports that you would miss with other apple laptop. Great buy.
505.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

506.author: DarbyC
506.review: I love this MacBook. The USB C ports are a great addition because of the different capabilities they hold. The only downside is that you need to get a dongle.. but they have good options with multi-purpose uses.
506.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

507.author: Maximus
507.review: This is my second MacBook Pro. My first model lasted about 10 years and then started having log on problems. It worked very well all those years. So I replaced it with a newer version and expect it to last for many years. It's fast and simple. I enjoy using it at home and while traveling.
507.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

508.author: dk60pilot
508.review: Newest apple and it will not disappoint. I went with the non tough bar as I did not see that function being that useful for me and not worth the additional 500 for it. Very happy with this purchase. I upgraded from a 2011 MacBook Pro to this. Very light and I love the SSD hard drive.
508.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

509.author: Wantingamactodothemost17
509.review_title: Wonderful picture - secure to be virus-free
509.review: My daughter loves this computer and her dad and I have ease of mind knowing the ability to get a virus is virtually non-existent. This computer is easy to use and she was able to figure most things out quickly. We are hoping for 10 years out of this computer if it's well taken care of!
509.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

510.author: Emma
510.review: After finishing high school, I was starting college so I needed a light and portable laptop that I could take with me everywhere. This MacBook Pro was just the right fit. It works great for schoolwork and syncs well with my other Apple products. I'm glad that I made this purchase.
510.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

511.author: Chuck
511.review: Apple products you can count on, I especially like not having to pay for Software Updates, migration from my prior MacBook Pro was seem less. Quality has always been an Apple tradition even down to packaging.
511.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

512.author: edmondr
512.review:
Beautiful design, amazing speed and performance, and reasonable price point.

This MacBook Pro is already blowing my old MacBook Pro (2012 model) out of the water, and in my opinion is a HUGE upgrade over this year's MB Air offering for a not-so-huge price increase.
512.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

513.author: Itsjustzee
513.review: Definitely worth the buy! I I was able to get a price match on mine, so, that definitely beat the price! This is my first Mac laptop and definitely loving mine. No complains on anything. Going from Windows to Mac was pretty easy:O)!
513.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

514.author: Bindhu
514.review: I have always wanted a MacBook Pro and when I finally got one, it truly has lived up to expectations. The battery life is good, the material is sturdy and is really convenient when you have an iPhone and using iCloud.
514.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

515.author: lilkutevboi
515.review: The Apple on the cover doesn't light up and the electric plug doesn't either, but, the computer is fast, the retina screen is easier on my eyes when doing long hour projects. The new upgraded Speakers are amazing! its like surround sounds an much louder, making movies and skype better.
515.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

516.author: Anonymous
516.review: Bought this thinking I could fit the bare necessities on it and use it for school. The operating system itself takes up 10-15gbs. After uploading my old computer onto it I only had 10gb left to use... it wasn't going to cut it. Ended up exchanging it for the 256gb one.
516.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

517.author: Tater
517.review_title: Great computer for a great price
517.review: This computer works flawlessly. As a first time Apple computer owner it feels great to make the swap. The best thing is knowing that my laptop wasn’t obsolete by the time I got home. With all the updates Apple puts out my computer is always up to date.
517.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

518.author: JesseMonroe
518.review: The 8gb 13" macbook pro (without touchbar) is a quick and efficient computer for traveling, shopping, low tech paperwork, etc. Have not had one problem with it and was super cheap ($850 w/ student discount)
518.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

519.author: DjDouglas
519.review: I purchase this laptop to used with serato dj pro, and it work awesome, I use Videos with the program and it good.. I haven't had any problems withs this macbook pro.. I was tired of the windows updates every 2 days.... bye bye Windows ;)
519.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

520.author: Megan
520.review: This is a great computer. I was concerned the screen would be a little small, using a desktop at work to this at home, but it hasn't been an issue. It's light weight, and very convenient to travel with. It's got enough speed for what I need.
520.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

521.author: lbchs22
521.review: Is it cheap? No. Can you get a better Windows computer for the money? Probably. But this computer is just great. Lightning fast, fantastic screen. Bare in mind, there is only two USB-C, which for me is great. Might be an issue for some, but an adapter can solve that issue easily.
521.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

522.author: G43E
522.review: Solid computer, just not sure it was worth the price. Time will tell. Nice that it comes with the Apple knockoffs of Microsoft Programs, but depending upon what you’re doing, you might still might want to buy the Microsoft programs because they are far superior.
522.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

523.author: sp123
523.review: A little pricey, it’s totally worth it though. It’s simple to use, it has a fast processor and it’s not a drag to lug around. As a college student, carrying a heavy laptop and books can get to be too much but this laptop being so lightweight definitely helps.
523.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

524.author: Yogi2022
524.review: I love my new MacBook Pro. It does a great job and is fast. The only thing is, the battery life is HORRIBLE. I think I might have a defective battery. It goes down 5-10% in the first 15 min of normal usage and it is just over a month old.
524.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

525.author: James
525.review: Tried my best to keep my 4 year old dell laptop going strong, but with multiple wi-if fails after windows updates, my frustrated self finally turned to Apple. Couldn’t be happier with my choice.
525.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

526.author: dreasweetpea
526.review: This is my first Mac, always had a PC. I probably will not go back. Apple is great and a step ahead of what I was going to buy the Microsoft Surface, which was almost same price. I did buy a laptop that was previously opened and received a discount which is even better.
526.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

527.author: Chris
527.review_title: Good Macbook pro for a student
527.review: I purchased the Apple - MacBook Pro- 13" Display - Intel Core i5 - 8 GB Memory - 128GB Flash Storage (Latest Model) - Space Gray but I did not liked it so I returned it because it was too slow for my needs since I required more memory but it will be a good computer for a student.
527.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

528.author: CVxRobertxCV
528.review: Been having a windows laptop for my entire life and now I have made a huge change to mac. So far great experience and never heard lound speakers on a computer and this one is far better than expected.
528.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

529.author: KimOhio
529.review: Got this for my daughter for her CCP classes at High School. She loves it but after a few months is started freezing and she couldn’t use it. Recently she did the upgrade and it seems to be working good. Hopefully this fixed the problem.
529.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

530.author: Anthony
530.review: Great MacBook. My favorite out of the 4 I’ve owned. I purchased this for work purposes but safari does not support the webpages/programs we use, unfortunately.. compatibility was an issue but besides that no complaints. No regrets in this purchase.. definitely recommend.
530.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

531.author: Pisces
531.review: I am extremely happy with this purchase. I had the old MacBook Pro and I was in need of a newer version. The price was right, the laptop is light and fast! I was able to transfer easily from my old Mac to this new one.
531.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

532.author: AlexBelm
532.review: I love my new macbook since my old one stopped working one month ago. This machine is everything I was looking for, simple and powerful for what I need. No touch or pens needed to use it... The only bad thing is that I need a lot of adaptors and cables to use my usb and micro sd.
532.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

533.author: Gineesh
533.review: Every college student needs a Macbook, it's extremely fast at running programs as well as browsing the web. It's also very easy to learn how to use as well. I recommend that every college student should have a Macbook to make their lives less miserable while attending college.
533.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

534.author: jj11
534.review: Overall, a fabulous laptop, I have enjoyed using it. The lack of ports is my biggest complaint, takes getting used to, and carrying around the adapter. For the most part, I've gotten used to it, having it ready for plugging into projects, but otherwise, been loving the computer
534.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

535.author: ProfessorWhiskers
535.review_title: Great laptop for the office and school
535.review: Its slim structure allows for great portability. Its core i5 processor is rather fast. The overall OS system works efficiently with 128 gigabytes. A great feature is a large trackpad which allows for shortcuts and efficiency. Overall, high-quality product and worth its cost.
535.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

536.author: Mike
536.review: I have been using this computer for a few weeks now. I have beed an iPod, iPhone, iPad user for years. Finally got a MacBook. So far I am amazed at the speed and graphics that this MacBook Pro has to offer. I have yet to find anything that I can say bad about this laptop.
536.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

537.author: Antonio
537.review: A few reasons for why I purchased the new MacBook Pro. I need laptop to take to college so I was looking for something durable. I also own an iMac so I know that it does not get viruses like windows does. Its also a sleek and light weight design. The battery life is not bad either.
537.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

538.author: FTF2
538.review: I purchased this Macbook as a GeekSquad approved, open box item. Based on the description of that designation, I was disappointed to find a nick/dent in the case, as well as multiple keys that were sticking. Probably will not purchase an open box item again.
538.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

539.author: usman
539.review: You can not go wrong with this laptop. Although not the most specs heavy, it serves the purpose. It is great for regular daily use and the specs are adequate if you are not doing something really complex.
539.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

540.author: kobro
540.review: I upgraded myself from the 2011 MacBook Pro to this model and it is a great machine. I was directed towards this model by the sales team based on my needs and also wasn't pressured into buying a model that was more expensive ,either with more memory or the touch bar.
540.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

541.author: Maddie
541.review: I’ve had this laptop for a few weeks now and I’ve been loving it. It has been performing much better than the asus laptop that I had previously which stopped working after a few months. I’m hopeful that this will last me through college.
541.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

542.author: MacBookRN
542.review: I’m returning to school and needed a laptop. This laptop was discounted $300 with and extra $50 for the student the discount. This computer is great and just what I needed. It’s fast and the screen is bright and very clear. I love it.
542.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

543.author: Nutmeg
543.review_title: The geek squad support has been a "nightmare".
543.review:
I must admit it's sleek, quick, and intuitive.But any questions that you have for the geek squad, they can't answer them via the 800#. Purchasing their support package is a joke!!! 
Apps...icons...transfer of data from one system to MacBook...too much of a headache!
543.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

544.author: TTThomas
544.review: I love how slim and lightweight this new MacBook is! I replaced my old laptop which I purchased in 2008. It was the best laptop I've ever owned and I am hoping this one will be even better. I love the look of this new one. I have not had it long, but so far, I love it!
544.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

545.author: DP82
545.review: I've been into apple products for the past 10 years and never been disappointed on any of my MacBook Pro I've always bought. This is the perfect size and color that floats my boat.You can't never go wrong with a 13'' MacBook Pro.Very portable, light and great design!!!
545.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

546.author: Technologyiscrazy
546.review: Great with your iPhone, unlocks with your Apple Watch, for less times typing your password in. iMessages on your MacBook is great. I found myself happy without Touch I.D. And saving that $. Fast, light, screen is great and perfect for the usual travel use
546.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

547.author: Crination
547.review:
I very good it's pretty fast nothing mind blowing 
But the amount of Memory internally is a joke.. so either get a Portable SSD Samsung has a good one for 99$ 500gb or get ready to live in the cloud
547.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

548.author: newtoapples
548.review_title: Fast and getting used to it
548.review: I am new to all things Apple. That being said, I like the laptop. However I don't like how some applications don't run on SAFARI, and having to find out that I needed to download a new browser is annoying.
548.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

549.author: Molly
549.review: Bought this after having had a Mac Book Air for about 7 years. I really liked the Air. What I like about my Mac is the amount of memory and the new programs built into the system. I also bought a external hard drive so storage will never be a problem any more.
549.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

550.author: Jaybriel
550.review_title: Everything it says it will be.
550.review: Hey, it’s a Mac Book pro so it’s everything you think it will be. The charger would be better if it was the mag safe one. USB-C is alright. Look, the bottom line is you need a good dongle and it’s overpriced like all Macs.
550.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

551.author: tenz
551.review: I was very torn when making the decision for a new computer: PC, Apple, 2 in 1 etc. I ended up going with another Apple MacBook, as that is what I had before which lasted 8 years. I am very happy with the purchase. Apple products are high quality and very user friendly.
551.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

552.author: Senna
552.review:
Honestly, I love this computer. It’s fast, great screen resolution, and helps me get my work done. Awesome operating system too!

Only downfall is battery life. If it lasted more than 8 hours I would have gave it 5 stars.
552.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

553.author: Vegasdadof4
553.review: After being on Windows since I can remember I was very skepticle. Totally worth it with all the features and being able to move things from my IPhone to Mac like nothing. Highly recommend for Apple users!!
553.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

554.author: DaHorrorGuy
554.review: I have used dells and lenenovos my whole adult life and I was always scared to head to Apple for a similar computer on account of comfort. Well, I'm all in for Apple now. Works so well!!!! Fast, durable, and easy to use and master. It was more expensive but so worth it!!!!
554.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

555.author: Andymac12
555.review: I finally Forked over the cheddar for a Mac! It was well worth it! A little hard to get used to at first but I really love it! Apple guy at Best Buy was really helpful. Very happy with purchase as it fits my needs for school and iinternet surfing.
555.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

556.author: staszek84
556.review: Purchased as a travel computer. Very light, portable and beautiful design as well as feel. Computer feels premium and is very responsive. I haven't tasted it all the way yet, but so far battery has been good doing normal pc tasks: word processing, email, etc.
556.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

557.author: Twanee
557.review: This computer is ok for basic use but not for heavy transfers in my type of profession. Being that I work in tv/film, I can't have my computer freezing up or restarting during downloads. The ports were a major issue. Not as universal as Apple projects it to be.
557.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

558.author: DizzyP
558.review: Upgrade my old Macbook Pro to this model. Could't pass on the advertised discount. Laptop is light and easy to travel with. Having to use adapters/dongle will take a little time to get use too, with only 2 usb-c (thunderbolt 3) ports.
558.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

559.author: Paigie10
559.review: I had a couple different laptop, but of course this one is number one for me, just started college and it works out perfect for me. Compact to carry around and light weight to make it easier to carry with all my books
559.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

560.author: MaMaO
560.review_title: MacBook Pro 13" Great for college student
560.review: I was hesitant to buy the product because of price, but my daughter prevailed. The MacBook Pro has been a great product for her. She used it her senior year in highschool and now on to college.
560.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

561.author: Maddy
561.review: I recently bought an open-box MacBook Pro for a little over $1,000. I have to say, it’s a great laptop! I do feel, however, that it is overpriced. Thus, I will be returning the laptop.
561.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

562.author: Hbic
562.review: I purchased an open-box model as an upgrade from my 2013 Macbook Pro. So far everything runs great. The only issue is the lack of regular USB ports. There is also no disc drive or SD reader. You have to purchase a separate adapter for everything.
562.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

563.author: Heather
563.review: We got both of our children this computer as graduation gifts. Our daughter is excited to use the computer at college and our son just graduated from college so he will be using this computer as he pursues his career in the Marines.
563.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

564.author: Wheelz954
564.review: This is a great laptop! Best I have ever owned! I am a college student and a small business owner. I use this for school and business and it has been prefect! Battery life is great! Charges quickly, and screen resolution is amazing! I would recommend this computer for anyone!
564.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

565.author: Ceairra
565.review: I've been in the market for a computer for a while but unsure of what brand. I'm so happy I went with this Mac, screen quality is very clear and it functions super fast , can't wait to edit my photos on this. Definitely worth the price
565.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

566.author: rjloe
566.review: My wife and I have used a Mac mini for the last 11 years. Never had a problem;em with it and was faster at 11 years than any new PC I've had at work. Only bought this one when the older system was no longer supported. I expect the same service out of the Mac Pro.
566.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

567.author: opasharley
567.review: This is a great laptop computer, we have a Mac desktop and is wonderful but the MacBook Pro is more convenient, my wife said she missed her other one and can’t use the Ipad for a lot of things, so I gave this to her for her birthday. She is very happy with it!!!
567.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

568.author: ItsMe
568.review: Apple always puts out great products although I would not classify this laptop as great. Too many things are lacking. No touchscreen for one. Seems like they just want to charge premium prices for everything. But macOS and their hardware seem to meld very well.
568.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

569.author: Mudcat
569.review: Our family has 4 iPhones, 2 iPads, a Mac mini and now 2 MacBooks. This MacBook purchased for our daughter going to college. Have always been extremely satisfied with each device. Feel you can't go wrong with Apple.
569.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

570.author: Reyna
570.review: It's my first Apple computer and it is amazing. I absolutely love how it works my iPhone and Apple watch. The only thing I had to do was purchase Microsoft office because apples word processing program I did not care for at all.
570.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

571.author: Terran
571.review: This is a very fast computer but I regret not getting one with a larger drive and there is currently no third party upgrades available for the 2017 model. The other draw back is USB C ports require the purchase of dongles. But it's a very good computer.
571.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

572.author: BijB
572.review: This is my fourth MacBook Pro and this is by far the greatest one. The screen is so bright and vibrant. I purchased during a sale and received $150 off plus another $150 student discount so that made it even better.
572.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

573.author: Kenneth
573.review:
I was disappointed with windows 10 and wanted to try OS.
I am pleased with the overall quality of the MacBook Pro and look forward to learning this new system. We will see how it goes.
573.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

574.author: Tamalam
574.review_title: Love the mac book pro. great for college students
574.review: We purchased a mac book pro for my 23 year old son in 2013. it has been a wonderful lap top with no problems or issues. So, we just purchased one for our 17 year old who is a high school Senior.
574.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

575.author: CallieJ
575.review: I purchased this laptop nearly a year ago and it is going strong. It is such a great computer - very quick. The only downside is there is no cd-port, but that is something I can live without.
575.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

576.author: Jake
576.review:
This is the most amazing laptop ever! It is so incredibly fast and always works perfectly.
I can’t recommend it highly enough!!! The screen is so beautiful and crisp. Love the touch pad!!! Great battery life!!!
576.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

577.author: Krustyvon
577.review: I’m very happy that I decided to opt up to the MacBook Pro. Very thin and lightweight and actually surprised how long the battery last compared to what other reviews state. It also charges back up faster than a phone it seems so it isn’t inconvenient when it is low.
577.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

578.author: Baylee
578.review: I have never had an MacBook before and I am very pleased with my MacBook Pro so far. Although simple features like copy, paste, exiting out of tabs, etc. are different on a Mac, it is simple to use once you figure it out.
578.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

579.author: FireWire
579.review: The screen resolution is far superior to the Air. Side by side you can clearly see the difference. When playing 4k it really shines. I think it is 2.5k, but it produces wonderfully crisp video. Speed is quite peppy and I can't say enough about the build quality.
579.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

580.author: Lizzy
580.review: Love it! It is the best Mac Book to date. Easy to use and connects quickly to my printer. I have not had one single issue with this MacBook. It beats out the old laptops that I have had for only a few months which they are still selling in stores.
580.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

581.author: WriterMom
581.review: Plenty of power for general use. Perfect for emailing, web surfing, streaming, and editing documents. Sleek, compact design without being too small for comfort.
581.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

582.author: jenn26
582.review: this is such an amazing light weight laptop computer. I would recommend it to any one! when I take it to school my backpack is not heavy any more! went from a 2012 Mac book pro to this latest version and I love it. the screen is so bright and big.
582.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

583.author: Mom2boys
583.review: Replaced my MacBook Air when my son spilt lemonade on it. I like this new MacBook Pro. The keyboard is kinda loud - clicky. Doesn’t really bother me but it bothers my husband when I’m working while he’s trying to sleep.
583.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

584.author: Karl
584.review: I bought this laptop for my sister-in-law that needed a computer as an alternative to using the computer at the library each day. She started using this laptop immediately (with a little help from my daughter) and has not had a single issue with this laptop.
584.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

585.author: nessa
585.review: I absolutely love this laptop great for editing on final cut and way more affordable than the other MacBook pro's. I did have to buy an external hard drive so that my videos would be stored.
585.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

586.author: curt
586.review: I don't believe you can go wrong with an Apple Laptop. It is intuitive in it's OS. The interface is easy to learn if you are not timid. The speed keeps up with your thought process, and the ease in which you set-up, maintain, and update are as painless as it comes.
586.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

587.author: JoBeretta
587.review: After 8 years my first MBP started having issues. The battery actually started to expand. I broke down and bought another even after almost buying a surface pro. MBP have always been reliable and other than my previous comment, they are worth every penny.
587.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

588.author: Azra
588.review: Well let’s start off with I’m a high school student, and I find this product useful. It’s fast pace and comes with a bunch of useful “gadgets” for a student, the setup however is not ordinary, it’s like using Microsoft word but I like it.
588.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

589.author: son112217
589.review_title: great laptop for college and very nice performance
589.review: I BUY THIS LAPTOP FOR MY SON, HE IS THE FIRST YEAR IN COLLEGE. HE LOVE THIS LAPTOP, IT LOOK NICE AND VERY GOOD PERFORRMANCE. IT HAS 8GB MEMORY AND 128GB FLASH STORAGE. I RECOMMEND DO NOT NEED TO UPGRADE. THIS LAPTOP LAST FOR MY SON UNTIL HE DONE HIS COLLEGE.
589.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

590.author: IceQueenAli
590.review: Exactly what I wanted and needed plus more. he design is sleek and elegant and unlike any other. Apple is the best and I love love love my new Mac Pro.And he price was less than I would have paid at the Apple store even with my student discount.
590.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

591.author: JanDav
591.review_title: once you go Mac you never go back
591.review: I had the windows surface. I love this Mac because it syncs to my phone, tablet and laptop. it was easy to set up. I love how documents look much clearer. I am loving all the Microsoft office product. I'm glad I decided on Mac instead of a windows computer.
591.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

592.author: Kchampn1
592.review: I love this MacBook. I chose the pro instead of the air because of the Retina display and I’m so glad i did!! I got it on sale for 1100 and i don’t regret it at all! I’m still learning how to use Apple but i am in love with this laptop.
592.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

593.author: ZINk
593.review_title: Great laptop for all basic needs
593.review: Yes, MacBook Pro is an expensive laptop but they are very good quality. Me recent pro lasted me 8 years until I decided to get a new one and I love it! This one is light,cool designed and helps me get all my basic laptop needs accomplished.
593.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

594.author: MacBookAppreciator
594.review_title: Any other brand does not compare to Apple
594.review: Love my macbooks. Loved my old 13 inch w Retina display and now this one. Tried a surface and returned it the next day bc it really doesn’t compare. My MacBook was acting up & showing a gray screen but it seems to be ok now.
594.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

595.author: Tash
595.review: I purchased this computer about a week ago and I’m loving it so far. I had the old MacBook Pro 13 and it needed to be upgraded. This one is better so far. The screen quality is probably the best I’ve ever seen
595.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

596.author: Robeyt
596.review: My teen loves this MAC! Lightweight, easy to pack and transport in her backpack. Quick to charge and holds it for over 10 hours. We got a great deal on South Carolina’s tax free weekend, along with registering with Best Buy’s “College Student Program”.
596.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

597.author: finallyhome
597.review: Been using MS products for years. Working in transitioning to the MacBook Pro. Not sure if my issues are operator error as the computer seems to work well and the picture is great. Will need more time on machine to determine how much I like it.
597.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

598.author: Haleigh
598.review: The keyboard on my MacBook Air died and it was expensive to get it fixed, so after reviewing this MacBook Pro online I decided to buy it and it's a great computer. I would recommend buying this one over the Air, just because of the problems I had with it.
598.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

599.author: Sara0327
599.review: You can never go wrong with a MacBook Pro. This newest version is one of the best so far. My only complaint is that I wish it came with a hyperdrive for all my usbs instead of having to purchase one separately
599.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

600.author: Michael
600.review_title: Macbook Pro is worth the price
600.review: The Macbook Pro is worth spending a bit more than the Air. The tech is more modern than the Air. That price tag will tempt you, but if you are already spending that much you might as well spend a bit more to get something superior.
600.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

601.author: MREC58
601.review_title: Great - but pricey - laptop for college freshman
601.review: The Apple MacBook Pro is a great, sturdy laptop for college. The MBP is ubiquitous, so most college IT folks can help out with any issues. The only downside, as with all Apple products, is the price.
601.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

602.author: ajcathcart98
602.review: I bought the MacBook very unsure about what to expect. It turned out to be absolutely amazing. The screen display is beautiful and it’s fast! It’s great! Would definitely recomend it for anyone who is about to start school.
602.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

603.author: AshC
603.review: I’m very happy with this purchase. I’ve had 3 laptops before I got this one and the performance is so much better. I am also a huge fan of Apple, so I love that all of my devices are synced together.
603.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

604.author: Metts
604.review: I believe this could he an awesome computer but when you're used to a basic computer and switch to a Mac the features are so different. I've only had it 1 month and I'm still learning how to use it
604.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

605.author: Melissa
605.review: I’m a student at UGA and I needed to get a new laptop because my other one was breaking. The pro is great for a college student because it’s easy to work on to do projects and papers! There are so many great aspects that enable it to make our lives easier!
605.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

606.author: Jackson
606.review: I love this new Mac Book. I originally wanted to purchase the Air but I’m glad I chose the Pro. This is my first Mac book and it was easy to learn to use. I would say it is user friendly. The display is great for editing videos. Great quality.
606.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

607.author: Tucker
607.review: My prior Mac pro of 6 years was without a single problem! Swinging the price when 2-4x that of a pc is hard to accept but the performance, quality and reliability of the Mac pro gives great confidence in another 5+ years of enjoyment for personal & professional use!
607.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

608.author: HappyCamper
608.review_title: Great computer for someone not computer literate.
608.review: The MacBook Pro was my first computer ever used. Lasted me 11 years! Totally happy with this new one, especially for someone like me, that is not knowledgable when it comes to technical stuff. Simple to use, and very reliable! Works great for photography!
608.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

609.author: StevenD
609.review: Overall, I like the laptop. My only complaints is the notches at the front (where you lift the screen) they are a bit pointy and leave marks on your wrist if using the touchpad for a extended amount of time.
609.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

610.author: Zeus
610.review_title: Expensive purchase but well worth it
610.review: I have wanted a new laptop for a while now however it was overwhelming trying to figure out what lap top would work for me I visited the Best Buy store and the sales associate was so very helpful with explaining the different features of their laptops
610.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

611.author: Mendy16
611.review: I've been told for years that the MacBook was worth the extra money but didn't believe it. Well, it is! I won't ever buy another brand. Absolutely the BEST laptop I've ever had! Go ahead - spend the extra money - you won't regret it.
611.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

612.author: Emerald87
612.review: First laptop I purchased. I read reviews and took recommendations from friends I wasn’t sure if I wanted a Mac, HP or Dell. Once I saw all the features I knew I had to buy a Mac. I figured since I own an iPhone mind as well go for another Apple product
612.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

613.author: AppleEphod
613.review: Bought the MacPro when I needed a new laptop for school. My laptop was older than my favorite bourbon and not as strong so I figured a new one was in order. Buy it and be cool like me.
613.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

614.author: Cbrew04
614.review: I purchased this MacBook to use with my home business and have not been disappointed. The processing speed is awesome as well as the backlit keyboard. The screen is beautiful. I only wish I didn’t have to purchase an adapter for my usb flash drive
614.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

615.author: Teejay0602
615.review_title: Great computer for anything you need
615.review: I love this computer. Does all what I need it to do. It’s also very fast and slim. Light and durable. Scream is very good quality and doesn’t give me any issues. Only thing is keys if not cleaned will get stuck but that’s it.
615.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

616.author: Raymond
616.review: speed performance and reliability this laptop has all you can ask for in a light weight computer. Just to say a bit about customer service from Apple and Best Buy its just simply the best around never had an issue unsolved in a quick professional manner.
616.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

617.author: Rooroo
617.review: It’s my first Mac laptop took me a little to understand it but now it’s my favorite I love it more than any other brand. Buy an external hard drive to store your stuff and this laptop is perfect.
617.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

618.author: Bigbuyer
618.review: Macpro in2017 is an amazing product, not just display, but is fast initiation and easy to use. The only weakness is you need to buy extra usb adaptor in order to transfer the documents.
618.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

619.author: Johnst
619.review: Bought this for my daughter for graduate school and she loves it but you need to purchase an adaptor as they have removed the standard USB connector. They have a new crazy one that I really don't understand. Just another expense for an already overpriced computer.
619.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

620.author: Scheu
620.review: Ordered at Galleria Mall in N Y and had it picked up in Tracy, Ca. Everything went smooth. BestBuy did a price match with Apple Store. I did go back the following week to get a refund as the computer went on sale for $150.00 less.
620.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

621.author: sdreyer
621.review: I was shopping around for a macbook for my son. Best buy happened to have a great price at the time which made my decision. I was going to get the Air but at the time the Pro was the price the Air was so I got the Pro. I am glad I did
621.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

622.author: Matty
622.review: I upgraded because my old MacBook (the first all black one) slowed down and eventually gave up on me. So far this MacBook is everything! I’m so happy with my upgrade. Great for work and school. I hope you last me just as long as my first.
622.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

623.author: Zenyen
623.review_title: Love the product. Best buy matched the best price
623.review: I was given Macbook Air for my birthday. Decided to upgrade to Macbook Pro. Best buy not only refunded me but also matched the lowest price I can find. Great service plus great product. Love Macbook Pro works so great.
623.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

624.author: Kibriya
624.review: This product need some improvement. There is no usb slot. This is not acceptable. They should give free USB adapter since it doesn’t have usb slot. Don’t like the keyboard. Price is bit expensive for this quality.
624.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

625.author: techlover
625.review: Awesome upgrade from my old Macbook Pro. Got lighter and the retina display is a lot better. The only downside is the USB-C ports, which means you have to spend a little more to get those adapters.
625.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

626.author: Morgan1425
626.review: After buying this product, I saw how fast and efficient the laptop is. The keyboard is fabulous and I would recommend it for any college student as it is a great choice that will last you all four years.
626.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

627.author: MacBook
627.review: I love that my keys have light for when I do homework at night this is my first MacBook, and its great. My previous laptop had no light on the keys at all which made things difficult to finish. I also got $100 off with my student discount which is also great .
627.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

628.author: Tayyyb9
628.review: This was an upgrade from my MacBook Air 2013, I love it, works great, love the key board except I hate that there isn’t any USB ports.. big downfall, just another way for Apple to make you spend more money.
628.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

629.author: Pranik
629.review: his MacBook Pro is a thing of beauty. Its fast in every way, so light that I can carry it every where, and it has yet to crash on me. Connects to my Apple TV's around the house without a problem.
629.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

630.author: vickolicko
630.review: This is my first Mac Book Pro and honestly the battery life compared to my Hp laptop is horrible, but so far it hasn't given me any other problems except short battery life and a slight orange glitch one time.
630.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

631.author: sethsmith
631.review: Awesome computer with amazing features and great battery life. I had been a PC user before but I will never go back! I had always wanted a Mac, and although it can be a splurge to buy one, it is definitely worth it!!
631.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

632.author: Hemprey
632.review: This is my first MacBook Pro and it’s been awesome. It’s fast compared to my older Windows laptop which is great. I use Pages for my document processing so I haven’t purchased MS Word. Overall, a great laptop and I’d definitely buy again in the future.
632.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

633.author: Marita
633.review: I bought this to replace an old Macbook Air and am happy with it so far. It's very quiet, very fast, doesn't overheat very often, and is powerful enough to allow me to edit photos and videos easily.
633.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

634.author: Sam9850
634.review:
A previous Mac Air user, i didn't feel any change to usability other than limited port connectivity. 
Design and build nothing can match, processor could have been a little more better, but i think they opted for low voltage for energy efficiency.
634.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

635.author: Srivak
635.review:
Laptop is good but battery life is not like typical apple product as it drains fast. Performance is good and value for money.

Outstanding sales person as well as caring for the family needs will let everyone know best buy is the place to go 
Apple - MacBook Pro® - 13" Display - Intel Core i5 - 8 GB Memory - 128GB Flash Storage - Space Gray

What can I say more? Nothing! Its the best! 
Thats why I bought two!
